analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba'i tshig gis thog ma nas zhi ba nyid la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that they aspire to realize that all phenomena are primordially peaceful and so on.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa ni mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa ni mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The absence of production of all phenomena is their sameness.

original: mos pa ni sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: mos pa ni sngar bstan zin to //
translated: Aspirational prayer was explained above.

original: de ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa la 'dod pa yin pas zlos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa la 'dod pa yin pas zlos pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is the aspiration to realize that all phenomena are unborn, it is not a repetition.

original: 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la 'di nyid la bslab par bya ba ni nyan pa dang klog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la 'di nyid la bslab par bya ba ni nyan pa dang klog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: One should train in just this by way of listening, reading, and so on.

original: 'dod pa 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa kho nas 'phel bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'dod pa 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa kho nas 'phel bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: And this desire increases only through striving in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan dag la ni skye ba med pa la sogs pa gang yang bshad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag la ni skye ba med pa la sogs pa gang yang bshad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But for others, there is no explanation of anything such as non-production.

original: gal te de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes brjod pa dang / byed pa po gang dag las gang la slob pa de dag dmigs shing yod par bstan par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes brjod pa dang / byed pa po gang dag las gang la slob pa de dag dmigs shing yod par bstan par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúOne should train in just this,‚Äù and if one demonstrates the existence of the apprehender, the agent, and the object of training,

original: de'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes gsungs te /
translated: then one should say, ‚Äúby way of non-apprehension.‚Äù

original: byed pa po dang / las dang bya ba byed pa la mngon par ma zhen par bslab par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //üîΩ'dis ni slob pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag @159a * //
analyzed: byed pa po dang / las dang bya ba byed pa la mngon par ma zhen par bslab par bya'o zhes sbyar ro // 'dis ni slob pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag @159a * //
translated: One should train without settling down on the agent, the object, and the action.

original: par bstan te /
analyzed: par bstan te /
translated: This shows that training is completely pure in the three spheres.

original: 'di yang seng ge lta bu'i tshul gyis skabs mnyan par bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di yang seng ge lta bu'i tshul gyis skabs mnyan par bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig la yang sbyar ro //
translated: This is also applied to the words ‚Äúlistening‚Äù and so on in the manner of a lion.

original: des na thams cad du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i nyan pa la sogs pa bya bar man ngag phog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na thams cad du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i nyan pa la sogs pa bya bar man ngag phog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in all cases, one should practice listening and so on with the complete purity of the three spheres.

original: de ltar rang la phan pa dang phan pa ma yin pa thob pa dang yongs su spang ba'i rgyu nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing /
analyzed: de ltar rang la phan pa dang phan pa ma yin pa thob pa dang yongs su spang ba'i rgyu nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing /
translated: Thus, the BhagavƒÅn has taught the cause of obtaining benefit and non-benefit and of abandoning it.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma las yon tan bsgrags su zin kyang blo gros kyi go cha mi brtan zhing yon tan la mngon par zhen pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag de las dbyung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma las yon tan bsgrags su zin kyang blo gros kyi go cha mi brtan zhing yon tan la mngon par zhen pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag de las dbyung ba'i phyir /
translated: Even though the qualities of the Bhagavatƒ´ are proclaimed in the Bhagavatƒ´, those whose armor of intelligence is unstable and who are mired in the swamp of attachment to qualities are to be lifted out of that.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan ma mchis pa nus pa ci yang ma mchis pa kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan ma mchis pa nus pa ci yang ma mchis pa kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the BhagavƒÅn says, ‚ÄúThe perfection of wisdom is without qualities, without any ability at all, and does not motivate,‚Äù and so on.

original: yon tan ma mchis pa ni yon tan gang lags zhes 'ga' zhig gis bar du chod de 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: yon tan ma mchis pa ni yon tan gang lags zhes 'ga' zhig gis bar du chod de 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Someone interrupts, asking, What are the good qualities of one who has no good qualities?

original: ji ltar yon tan med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar yon tan med pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that there are no good qualities?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang gis nus pa ci yang ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang gis nus pa ci yang ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is that by which there is no ability at all.

original: byed pa ci yang med pa nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byed pa ci yang med pa nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to establish that there is no activity at all,

original: kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: it is said, not initiating, up to

original: bsam du ma mchis pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: bsam du ma mchis pa ma lags pa /
translated: not being inconceivable,

original: bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: not doing,

original: rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: not causing destruction,

original: dngos po ma mchis pa'i bar du lags na /
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis pa'i bar du lags na /
translated: up to not being a thing.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: Blessed One, what are the good qualities of the perfection of wisdom?

original: de la sbyin pa kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: de la sbyin pa kun nas slong bar mi bgyid pa'o //
translated: Here, it is not initiating generosity,

original: ser sna rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: ser sna rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa'o //
translated: not destroying stinginess,

original: chos gang yang mi len pa ni tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos gang yang skyed par mi byed pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos gang yang mi len pa ni tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos gang yang skyed par mi byed pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Not taking up any dharma is the definition of morality, which means not producing any dharma.

original: mi 'dor ba ni tshul khrims 'chal pa 'dor bar mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'dor ba ni tshul khrims 'chal pa 'dor bar mi byed pa'o //
translated: Not rejecting is not rejecting immorality.

original: g-yo ba ma mchis pa ni bzod pa bsgom pa'i tshe g-yo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: g-yo ba ma mchis pa ni bzod pa bsgom pa'i tshe g-yo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not wavering is because there is no wavering when cultivating patience.

original: byed pa ma mchis pa ni khro ba bsal ba'i ched du spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa ma mchis pa ni khro ba bsal ba'i ched du spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not acting is because there is no practice for the purpose of removing anger.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa ma lags pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa ma lags pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the essence of wisdom.üîΩNot seeing an essence is not giving any dharma of laziness.

original: ngo bo nyid mthong ba ma lags pa ni le lo'i chos gang yang sbyin par mi bgyid pa ni bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid mthong ba ma lags pa ni le lo'i chos gang yang sbyin par mi bgyid pa ni bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The definition of concentration is concentration, absorption, and equipoise.

original: chos thams cad dang 'gal bar mi byed @159b pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa rnam par g-yeng ba la sogs pa thams cad sel bar mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos thams cad dang 'gal bar mi byed @159b pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa rnam par g-yeng ba la sogs pa thams cad sel bar mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Not contradicting all dharmas means not removing all distractions, etc. which are adverse factors.

original: thams cad kyi sgra ni brjod par 'dod pa bsdus pa'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi sgra ni brjod par 'dod pa bsdus pa'i tshig yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúall‚Äù includes what is intended to be expressed.

original: chos thams cad skyed par mi bgyid pa zhes yi ge kha cig las 'byung ba de'i don ni rnam par g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad chung par byed ces bya ba dang / shin tu ches chung bar bsgrubs pas rnam par gnon pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad skyed par mi bgyid pa zhes yi ge kha cig las 'byung ba de'i don ni rnam par g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad chung par byed ces bya ba dang / shin tu ches chung bar bsgrubs pas rnam par gnon pa dang /
translated: Some texts say ‚Äúnot producing all dharmas,‚Äù which means not producing the distractions, etc. which are all dharmas, and not producing the roots of virtue which are the antidotes to those.

original: rtsa ba nas 'byin pa de dag skyed par mi byed pa ni byed pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtsa ba nas 'byin pa de dag skyed par mi byed pa ni byed pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúNot producing‚Äù means not causing them to exist.

original: chos thams cad tha dad pa nyid du mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa tha dad pas byed cing bya ba 'am /
analyzed: chos thams cad tha dad pa nyid du mi bgyid pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa tha dad pas byed cing bya ba 'am /
translated: ‚ÄúNot making all dharmas different‚Äù means not making them different through adverse differences, or not making them different through the differences of their own characteristics.

original: tha dad pa nyid du byed pa ni tha dad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du byed pa ni tha dad par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMaking distinctions‚Äù means making distinctions.

original: de gang la spyod pa ma yin pa de ni tha dad pa nyid du byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la spyod pa ma yin pa de ni tha dad pa nyid du byed pa med pa'o //
translated: That which does not engage in that is ‚Äúwithout making distinctions.‚Äù

original: chos thams cad la thos pa la sogs pa tha dad par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab rnams rnam par dbye bar mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos thams cad la thos pa la sogs pa tha dad par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab rnams rnam par dbye bar mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúNot making distinctions in all dharmas‚Äù means that the wisdoms born of listening, etc., do not make distinctions.

original: ma bgyis pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i yul la byed pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bgyis pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i yul la byed pa med pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNot doing‚Äù means not doing with regard to the object of abandoning the resistances.

original: bzod mi bgyid pa zhes gal te 'byung na ni de'i tshe don gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: bzod mi bgyid pa zhes gal te 'byung na ni de'i tshe don gsal ba yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúNot enduring‚Äù means that if something arises, then at that time the meaning is clear.

original: mi bzod pa ni thabs su mi rung ba bsrung ba yin no //
analyzed: mi bzod pa ni thabs su mi rung ba bsrung ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNot enduring‚Äù means protecting oneself from what is not suitable.

original: gang las mi pas pa zhes 'byung ba der bas pa ni byed pa la dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: gang las mi pas pa zhes 'byung ba der bas pa ni byed pa la dgongs pa ste /
translated: Where ‚Äúnot being patient‚Äù is found, there ‚Äúbeing patient‚Äù is intended to mean doing.

original: sgra rnams ni brjod par 'dod pa cam gyi rjes su 'brang ba yin gyi don so sor nges pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sgra rnams ni brjod par 'dod pa cam gyi rjes su 'brang ba yin gyi don so sor nges pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Words follow merely what is wished to be expressed, but there is no definite meaning.

original: gang zhig la thabs la bas par byed par bya ba yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni mi bas pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig la thabs la bas par byed par bya ba yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni mi bas pa'o //
translated: That which is not to be surpassed is not to be surpassed.

original: rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs lags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'jig par mi bgyid pa ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs lags pa'o //
translated: That which is not to be destroyed is the opposite of that.

original: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas nas so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / yi ge kha cig las byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang zhes 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang sbyin bar bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas nas so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / yi ge kha cig las byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang zhes 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang sbyin bar bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: With regard to the perfection of vows, it is said that one does not give away the qualities of ordinary beings, the qualities of arhats, and in some texts, the qualities of bodhisattvas, and also the qualities of buddhas.

original: de la so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ji ltar sbyin par mi byed ce na /
analyzed: de la so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ji ltar sbyin par mi byed ce na /
translated: How is it that one does not give away the qualities of ordinary beings?

original: 'di ltar 'khor ba sgrub par mi bgyid pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'khor ba sgrub par mi bgyid pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said that one does not establish samsara.

original: de ltar gyur cig //
analyzed: de ltar gyur cig //
translated: May it be like this!üîΩMay I become any kind of god!

original: lha gang yang rung bar gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i smon lam 'debs par mi byed pa'i phyir /üîΩ@160a * // ro ;
analyzed: lha gang yang rung bar gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i smon lam 'debs par mi byed pa'i phyir /üîΩ@160a * // ro ;
translated: One does not make such prayers.

original: / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ji ltar sbyin par mi byed ce na /
analyzed: / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ji ltar sbyin par mi byed ce na /
translated: How does he not give the qualities of an arhat?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa len par mi bgyid pa zhes gsungs te /üîΩlhag ma med pa'am /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa len par mi bgyid pa zhes gsungs te / lhag ma med pa'am /
translated: He does not take up nirvana.

original: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa len par mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa len par mi byed pa ste /
translated: He does not take up nirvana with or without remainder.

original: 'di'i don ni de la sgrub par mi byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni de la sgrub par mi byed pa yin te /
translated: The meaning is that he does not practice it.

original: de la smos par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la smos par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He does not mention it.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par mi byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par mi byed ce na /
translated: How does he not give the qualities of a buddha and bodhisattva?üîΩHe does not give what is not a buddha quality.

original: gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes gsungs te mi sbyor zhing de'i don smon lam mi 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes gsungs te mi sbyor zhing de'i don smon lam mi 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He does not apply himself to it and does not aspire to its meaning.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúBuddha qualities‚Äù is a synecdoche.

original: smon lam mi 'debs pas rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam mi 'debs pas rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa'o //
translated: He does not aspire to it, so he does not destroy it.

original: bsam par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni bsam pa'i stobs mngon par sgrub pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni bsam pa'i stobs mngon par sgrub pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: What is not to be thought is not the accomplishment of the power of thought.

original: bsam du ma mchis pa ma lags pa de ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba'i phyir shin tu byed pa med pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam du ma mchis pa ma lags pa de ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba'i phyir shin tu byed pa med pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: What is not unthinkable is not the absence of thorough performance, in order to eliminate the opposing side to that.

original: bgyid pa ma lags pa ni ye shes la'o //
analyzed: bgyid pa ma lags pa ni ye shes la'o //
translated: What is not to be done is in regard to knowledge.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa las 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa las 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa'o //
translated: It is not to be destroyed by possessing the opposing side.

original: de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo la de nus pa yod pa ma yin pa'o//
analyzed: de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo la de nus pa yod pa ma yin pa'o//
translated: In all of these, it is not possible in the nature of non-apprehension.

original: 'jig par bgyid ba ma lags pa nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i bar du ma lags pa'i bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang lags zhes gsungs pa la /
analyzed: 'jig par bgyid ba ma lags pa nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i bar du ma lags pa'i bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang lags zhes gsungs pa la /
translated: What is not to be destroyed up to what is not a non-entity, Blessed One, are the qualities of the perfection of wisdom?

original: bar du zhes smos pas thog ma nas zhi ba dang rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams gzung ngo //
analyzed: bar du zhes smos pas thog ma nas zhi ba dang rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams gzung ngo //
translated: By saying ‚Äúin the middle,‚Äù the aspects of peace from the beginning, natural complete nirvana, and so on, are included.

original: glegs bam kha cig las 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes bya ba de'i mjug thogs su tshig gzhan dag kyang 'byung ba ni chos thams cad skyed pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: glegs bam kha cig las 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes bya ba de'i mjug thogs su tshig gzhan dag kyang 'byung ba ni chos thams cad skyed pa ma lags pa /
translated: In some texts, after the phrase ‚Äúnot causing destruction,‚Äù other words appear: ‚Äúnot producing all phenomena,

original: 'gog pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: 'gog pa ma lags pa /
translated: not ceasing,

original: chad par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: chad par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: not annihilating,

original: rtag par bgyid pa ma lags pa /üîΩ'ong bar bgyid ba ma lags pa /
analyzed: rtag par bgyid pa ma lags pa / 'ong bar bgyid ba ma lags pa /
translated: not making permanent,üîΩnot causing to come,

original: 'gro bar bgyid pa ma lags pa /üîΩrnam par 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: 'gro bar bgyid pa ma lags pa / rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: not causing to go,üîΩnot causing to be differentiated,

original: me 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: me 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: not causing to be non-differentiated,

original: gnyis su bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: gnyis su bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: not causing to be dual,

original: mi gnyis par bgyid pa lags pa zhes 'byung ba de dag gi don ni sngar pha @160b rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa'i skabs su bstan zin mod kyi /
analyzed: mi gnyis par bgyid pa lags pa zhes 'byung ba de dag gi don ni sngar pha @160b rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa'i skabs su bstan zin mod kyi /
translated: not causing to be non-dual.‚Äù The meaning of these has already been explained in the context of the perfections.

original: de ni phyir bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni phyir bstan pa yin no //
translated: However, they are taught again here.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa'i chos thams cad skyed pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa'i chos thams cad skyed pa ma lags pa /
translated: ‚ÄúNot producing all phenomena‚Äù refers to the four correct abandonments, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and so on.

original: 'gog pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: 'gog pa ma lags pa /
translated: It is not a cessation.

original: chad par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams la yin te /üîΩ'gog pa ni rnam par gnon pa'o //
analyzed: chad par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams la yin te / 'gog pa ni rnam par gnon pa'o //
translated: It is not a cutting off in regard to the adverse elements.üîΩCessation is the suppression of the adverse elements.

original: chad pa ni de rtsa ba nas drungs 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: chad pa ni de rtsa ba nas drungs 'byin pa'o //
translated: Cutting off is the uprooting of the latter.

original: 'dir dgongs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir dgongs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The intention here is the same as before.

original: rtag par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams nyid la yin te /
analyzed: rtag par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams nyid la yin te /
translated: It is not a making permanent in regard to the qualities such as the correct exertions,

original: de dag kyang rang gi ngang gis 'gro ba ji srid gnas par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang rang gi ngang gis 'gro ba ji srid gnas par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because these are naturally progressive and remain as long as one lives.

original: rtag par dus thams cad du 'dug pa'i ngo bo la byed pa med do zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtag par dus thams cad du 'dug pa'i ngo bo la byed pa med do zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is not a making permanent in the nature of remaining at all times, because there is no activity.

original: 'ong bar bgyid pa ma lags pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byung ste /
analyzed: 'ong bar bgyid pa ma lags pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byung ste /
translated: It is not a bringing about of coming in regard to the future time,

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus su 'ong ba ma yin pa ste 'pho bar smra ba dag ji skad brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus su 'ong ba ma yin pa ste 'pho bar smra ba dag ji skad brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: because it is not a coming in the present time, as is said by the Samkhyas.

original: 'gro bar bgyid pa ma lags pa ni da ltar las byung ba ste 'das par 'jug pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar bgyid pa ma lags pa ni da ltar las byung ba ste 'das par 'jug pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which does not cause to go is that which has arisen in the present, not that which has entered the past.

original: de dag gis ni 'di'i rang gi ngo bo sngon dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa yin pa dang / 'bras bu'i dus mi gnas pa yin na de ji ltar ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no ;üîΩ/ de bas na bar med pa tsam la byed do zhes bya ba 'di ni brtags pa kho na yin bar rnam par 'jog cing stong pa dang / byed pa med pa nyid sgrub par byed pa ni rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'di'i rang gi ngo bo sngon dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa yin pa dang / 'bras bu'i dus mi gnas pa yin na de ji ltar ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no ; / de bas na bar med pa tsam la byed do zhes bya ba 'di ni brtags pa kho na yin bar rnam par 'jog cing stong pa dang / byed pa med pa nyid sgrub par byed pa ni rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa /
translated: They are empty of a prior and subsequent end, and they do not endure at the time of their effect. So how could they be agents?üîΩTherefore, this is mere imputation to say that they are agents.üîΩThe statement, ‚ÄúThey do not divide, they do not not divide‚Äù

original: mi 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: mi 'byed par bgyid pa ma lags pa zhes pa yin te /
translated: establishes that they are empty and devoid of activity.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena are pure by nature.

original: gnyis su bgyid pa ma lags pa mi gnyis par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni gnyis las dpen pa'i dus thams cad du gnas pa'i phyir de dag gis yon tan la sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: gnyis su bgyid pa ma lags pa mi gnyis par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni gnyis las dpen pa'i dus thams cad du gnas pa'i phyir de dag gis yon tan la sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' bsal ba yin no //
translated: The non-dual is not dual, because it abides in all times as isolated from duality. Thus, they remove the extreme of superimposition with respect to the qualities.

original: yon tan de dag la skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha'i 'dam du gzhan dag 'bying ba de bas na de yang rtsa ba nas 'don pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan de dag la skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha'i 'dam du gzhan dag 'bying ba de bas na de yang rtsa ba nas 'don pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Others sink in the mud of the extreme of denial with respect to those qualities. Therefore, in order to pull them out from the root,

original: 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: this should be known as a quality of this perfection of wisdom.

original: gang zhe na 'jam dpal g-yo ba med pa nas dngos po med pa'i bar zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: gang zhe na 'jam dpal g-yo ba med pa nas dngos po med pa'i bar zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: What is that? It is the non-movement of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ up to the non-existence of things.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught:

original: @161a * // gang gis de dag ni brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad med pa'i ngo bo yin pa dang / yon tan dang skyon thams cad bskyed pa dang spang ba la g-yo ba med pa de dag nyid rang gi ngang gis yon tan thams cad rgyas pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: @161a * // gang gis de dag ni brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad med pa'i ngo bo yin pa dang / yon tan dang skyon thams cad bskyed pa dang spang ba la g-yo ba med pa de dag nyid rang gi ngang gis yon tan thams cad rgyas pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
translated: Those who know that all imputed things are by nature nonexistent and that they are unmoved with regard to the generation and abandonment of all good qualities and faults, respectively, will, by virtue of their own nature, expand all good qualities.

original: skyon gyi dra ba mtha' dag shin tu ring bar gyur pa'i phyir yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skyon gyi dra ba mtha' dag shin tu ring bar gyur pa'i phyir yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Those who are free from the faults of the bodhisattva stages and the perfections are called ‚Äúendowed with good qualities‚Äù because they are the nature of the non-existence of all imagined things, and because they are unshaken in the generation and abandonment of all good qualities and faults, and because all good qualities are naturally expanded in them.üîΩAnd because the net of faults is very far away.

original: de bas na de lta bur gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de lta bur gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, the perfection of wisdom that abides in that way is the cause of the direct realization of buddhahood.

original: 'o na gang dag byang chub don du mi gnyer zhing 'dod chen po ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ting nge 'dzin nyi tshe gang la gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bcas te blta ba dang /
analyzed: 'o na gang dag byang chub don du mi gnyer zhing 'dod chen po ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ting nge 'dzin nyi tshe gang la gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bcas te blta ba dang /
translated: Now, those bodhisattvas who do not strive for enlightenment and are not of great desire, abiding in just the meditative stabilization, see all the Blessed Buddhas and the buddha-fields.

original: de dag gi mtshan brjod pa yang shes pa dang / mchod pa bla na med pa yang byed pa dang / de dag gis chos bstan pa yang khong du chud pa dang / mchog de dag tsam don du gnyer ba de dag gis 'di la bslab par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gi mtshan brjod pa yang shes pa dang / mchod pa bla na med pa yang byed pa dang / de dag gis chos bstan pa yang khong du chud pa dang / mchog de dag tsam don du gnyer ba de dag gis 'di la bslab par bya'o zhe na /
translated: Also, they should know the names of those, make unsurpassable offerings to them, understand the teachings of those, and strive for just those excellences.

original: de'i phyir 'jam dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jam dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
translated: Therefore, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, a bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who wishes to train in the bodhisattva samƒÅdhi should do this...

original: // /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa rgya cher bshad pa bam po drug pa'o //
analyzed: // /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa rgya cher bshad pa bam po drug pa'o //
translated: Noble NƒÅgƒÅrjuna's commentary on the Perfection of Wisdom in Seven Hundred Lines, volume six.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i thabs yongs su shes pa chol ba dang / de'i thabs yongs su shes pa bsgrub pas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i thabs yongs su shes pa chol ba dang / de'i thabs yongs su shes pa bsgrub pas so //
translated: Wishes to train in the bodhisattva samƒÅdhi means to completely understand the method for that and to accomplish the complete understanding of the method.

original: 'di la mngon par brtson pa med par 'grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'di la mngon par brtson pa med par 'grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: The summary meaning is: ‚ÄúThis is not accomplished without striving.‚Äù

original: mi bslab pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas so //
analyzed: mi bslab pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas so //
translated: In the manner of not training, as before, through the complete purity of the three spheres.

original: de bas na mi dmigs par sbyor ba kho na 'dir thabs yin te /
analyzed: de bas na mi dmigs par sbyor ba kho na 'dir thabs yin te /
translated: Therefore, the method here is precisely the application of non-apprehension,

original: rang yang mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang yang mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is also the nature of non-apprehension.

original: 'o na gal te rang yang mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo yin na de ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya /
analyzed: 'o na gal te rang yang mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo yin na de ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya /
translated: If it is also the nature of non-apprehension, why is it called the perfection of wisdom?

original: 'di ltar dris pa'i yul ni pha rol tu phyin pa yin par 'dis mthong zhing dmigs pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar dris pa'i yul ni pha rol tu phyin pa yin par 'dis mthong zhing dmigs pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The object of such a question is seen as a perfection by this, and is called that.

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol to //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol to //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One is asked, ‚ÄúWhy is it called the perfection of wisdom?‚Äù

original: lan ni 'jam dpal ma skyes ma @161b 'gags pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lan ni 'jam dpal ma skyes ma @161b 'gags pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The answer is, ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, because it is unborn and unceasing.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: This is analyzed as follows:

original: gzod ma nas zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzod ma nas zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: Because of being primordially peaceful, etc.

original: gnas pa dang 'jig pa de gnyis zhi zhing bral ba gang gi yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba'o //
analyzed: gnas pa dang 'jig pa de gnyis zhi zhing bral ba gang gi yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba'o //
translated: That which is peaceful and free from those two, persistence and destruction, is primordially peaceful.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do //
translated: Its reality is just that.

original: de bas na gzod ma nas zhi ba nyid kyi phyir 'jam dpal ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na gzod ma nas zhi ba nyid kyi phyir 'jam dpal ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because of being primordially peaceful, Manjusri is unborn.üîΩBecause of not being nonexistent, etc.

original: mi 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir rgyun gyis skye zhing 'byung ba dang bral bas mi 'byung ba ste rgyun chad pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir rgyun gyis skye zhing 'byung ba dang bral bas mi 'byung ba ste rgyun chad pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from birth and origination through a continuum, it is nonexistent, i.e., interrupted.

original: de gang la yod pa ma yin pa de ni mi 'byung ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa ma yin pa de ni mi 'byung ba med pa'o //
translated: That which does not have that is not nonexistent.

original: de'i dngos po ni mi 'byung ba med pa nyid de 'khor ba ji srid du rtsol ba med par 'jig rten la phan par bya ba'i phyir bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni mi 'byung ba med pa nyid de 'khor ba ji srid du rtsol ba med par 'jig rten la phan par bya ba'i phyir bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Its reality is not being nonexistent, i.e., remaining for as long as cyclic existence lasts, in order to benefit the world without effort.

original: de bas na mi 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ma 'gags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mi 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ma 'gags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of not being nonexistent, it is unceasing.

original: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang mi 'byung ba med pa gnyis go rims bsnor nas rnam par 'byed pa ni bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzod ma nas zhi ba dang mi 'byung ba med pa gnyis go rims bsnor nas rnam par 'byed pa ni bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The two, primordially peaceful and not non-arisen, are distinguished in reverse order, because of the absence of activity and up to because of the absence of entity.

original: 'di la bdag gi ched dang gzhan gyi ched du rtsol ba bya ba med pas bya ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la bdag gi ched dang gzhan gyi ched du rtsol ba bya ba med pas bya ba med pa'o //
translated: Here, there is no activity for the sake of self or for the sake of others, so it is without activity.

original: de'i dngos po ni nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni nyid do //
translated: Its entity is just that.

original: de bas na mi 'byung ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mi 'byung ba med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not non-arisen.

original: 'di la kun nas brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad yod pa ma yin pas dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la kun nas brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad yod pa ma yin pas dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Here, since all imagined entities do not exist, it is without entity.

original: de'i dngos po ni nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni nyid do //
translated: Its entity is just that.

original: de bas na gzod ma nas zhi ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzod ma nas zhi ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is primordially peaceful.

original: de ltar na gang dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de ni kun brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gang dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de ni kun brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, what is called ‚Äúwithout entity‚Äù is distinguished by all imagined entities.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshon pa tsam du zad kyi ;
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshon pa tsam du zad kyi ;
translated: That is the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is merely an illustration, but it should be seen as not being nonexistent.

original: mjug sdud pa ni de bas na 'jam dpal gtan tshigs de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bshad do zhes bya ba khongs su dbyung ngo //
analyzed: mjug sdud pa ni de bas na 'jam dpal gtan tshigs de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bshad do zhes bya ba khongs su dbyung ngo //
translated: The conclusion is: Therefore, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, for that reason it is explained as the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog ni sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang bral ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog ni sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang bral ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'o //
translated: The supreme perfection of wisdom is free from all superimpositions, and it is the attainment of nonabiding nirvƒÅ·πáa, like a wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: pha rol de dang 'dra bar phyin pa dang / son pa dang thob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol de dang 'dra bar phyin pa dang / son pa dang thob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Going to that perfection, arriving, and attaining is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: yul la mi 'dzin pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa sus rtogs she na /
analyzed: yul la mi 'dzin pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa sus rtogs she na /
translated: If it is asked by whom is this taught because of not apprehending an object,

original: de'i phyir gtso bor na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtso bor na /
translated: then for that reason, primarily,

original: de ni byang @162a * //
analyzed: de ni byang @162a * //
translated: that is the bodhisattva.

original: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod yul 'de zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod yul 'de zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is the domain of the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas.

original: so so bdag nyid kyis rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: so so bdag nyid kyis rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that it is the domain that is known by oneself.

original: ci de yul yin par blta bar bya ba'am zhe na ma yin na zhes bya ba'i phyir /üîΩgang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ci de yul yin par blta bar bya ba'am zhe na ma yin na zhes bya ba'i phyir / gang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúShould that be viewed as a domain?‚Äù [the answer is] no.üîΩTherefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThat which is not the domain of all phenomena.‚Äù

original: yul thams cad spyod yul du gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin te /
analyzed: yul thams cad spyod yul du gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin te /
translated: It is not the case that all domains are domains.

original: rang rig pa yang brtags pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //üîΩde bas na don 'di la spyod cing rang gis nyams su myong na don de lta bu la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spyod yul la zhugs pa yin no zhes ston pa ni spyod yul 'di la spyod na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la
analyzed: rang rig pa yang brtags pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o // de bas na don 'di la spyod cing rang gis nyams su myong na don de lta bu la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spyod yul la zhugs pa yin no zhes ston pa ni spyod yul 'di la spyod na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la
translated: The intention is that even reflexive awareness is imputed.üîΩTherefore, if one practices this meaning and experiences it for oneself, it is taught that a bodhisattva who practices such a meaning is engaged in the domain.

original: sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúIf one practices this domain, one is called a bodhisattva‚Äù and so on is made.

original: gsungs pa'i don mjug sdud pa ni /
analyzed: gsungs pa'i don mjug sdud pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the statement is summarized:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: spyod yul ma yin pa theg pa thams cad pa 'di nyid spyod yul yin no zhes bya ba yin te 'di lta ste /üîΩspyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yang dag pa thams cad pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin pa theg pa thams cad pa 'di nyid spyod yul yin no zhes bya ba yin te 'di lta ste / spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yang dag pa thams cad pa 'di yin te /
translated: This very domain of all vehicles is the domain.üîΩThis very domain of all vehicles is the domain of the non-domain.

original: theg pa thams cad la byung ba 'am de dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa thams cad la byung ba 'am de dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is the domain of all vehicles, or it is the intention of that.

original: 'di ltar 'dir bdag med pa gnyi ga yang bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir bdag med pa gnyi ga yang bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, here both types of selflessness are taught.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni spyod yul yin na ji ltar spyod yul ma yin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni spyod yul yin na ji ltar spyod yul ma yin pa nyid yin te /
translated: Why is that? If it is the domain, how is it the non-domain?

original: gcig la 'gal la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gcig la 'gal la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is contradictory in one, that is the meaning.

original: so so la lto ga nas tha dad pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: so so la lto ga nas tha dad pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i phyir /
translated: There is no contradiction because each is different.

original: spyod yul 'di ni ma byas pa ste zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: spyod yul 'di ni ma byas pa ste zhes gsungs te /
translated: This domain is unfabricated, as stated.

original: byas pa dang / bcos pa dang / brtags pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yin la /
analyzed: byas pa dang / bcos pa dang / brtags pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yin la /
translated: It is fabricated, constructed, and so on up to imputed.

original: byas pa med pa ni ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: byas pa med pa ni ma byas pa ste /
translated: The non-fabricated is the unfabricated.

original: ji ltar bya bzhin du gnas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar bya bzhin du gnas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is like an action, that is the meaning.

original: de'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be not an object-field.

original: zhar la 'phros pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhar la 'phros pa rdzogs so /
translated: The digression is finished.

original: // /'di brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // /'di brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be stated:

original: thabs gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di ring po mi thogs par thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: thabs gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di ring po mi thogs par thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba de'i phyir /
translated: By what method will one attain this inconceivable Buddhahood and enlightenment without delay?

original: bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris so //
translated: Therefore, it is asked, ‚ÄúBhagavat, by what practice?‚Äù and so forth.

original: mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pas kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur mod kyi /üîΩde ni yun ring pos so zhes bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pas kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur mod kyi / de ni yun ring pos so zhes bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Even by worshipping a stupa, etc., one will attain enlightenment, butüîΩthat is after a long time.

original: myur du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: myur du zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúquickly.‚Äù

original: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu @162b phyin pa la spyad na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan ldon pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu @162b phyin pa la spyad na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan ldon pa yin te /
translated: The answer is given by ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, if one practices the perfection of wisdom,‚Äù and so forth.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson ba ni re zhig gtso bor gyur pa thabs gcig po yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson ba ni re zhig gtso bor gyur pa thabs gcig po yin te /
translated: One who is diligent in the perfection of wisdom is, for the time being, the sole method that is foremost.

original: ji skad du sngar bstan pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du sngar bstan pa'i don yin no //
translated: This is the meaning that was taught previously.

original: de'i sngon du song ba'i thabs gzhan yang yod pa de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i sngon du song ba'i thabs gzhan yang yod pa de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that there are other methods that precede that,

original: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, there is the meditative stabilization called the single procedure.‚Äù

original: thabs gang gis 'di 'thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: thabs gang gis 'di 'thob par 'gyur /
translated: By what method is this attained?

original: rgyu mtshan nyid gang gis 'di'i ming de skad ces bya ba'i bsam pa ston pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan nyid gang gis 'di'i ming de skad ces bya ba'i bsam pa ston pa ni /
translated: In order to teach the reason why its name is that, he says,

original: bcom ldan 'das bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar 'jug par bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar 'jug par bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúBlessed One, how should a bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva enter the single procedure meditative stabilization?‚Äù

original: rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin phye ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin phye ba yin gyi /
translated: Meditative stabilizations are differentiated by different causes, but not by different results.

original: bdag nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin pas gnyi ga dris te /
analyzed: bdag nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin pas gnyi ga dris te /
translated: Therefore, he asks about both.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the meditative stabilizations of all buddhas and bodhisattvas are focused on suchness.

original: de la brjod par bya ba nyung ba'i phyir dris pa phyi ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ba nyung ba'i phyir dris pa phyi ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: Although the latter question is asked because there is less to be said,

original: re zhig don ston par byed pa ni 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas sa zhes bya ba yin te skye ba med pa ni brtags pa'i chos kyis stong ba yin par ni lan du ma bstan to
analyzed: re zhig don ston par byed pa ni 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas sa zhes bya ba yin te skye ba med pa ni brtags pa'i chos kyis stong ba yin par ni lan du ma bstan to
translated: the meaning is taught first. This is called the single array of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, which is a term for non-arising. Non-arising is taught to be empty of imputed phenomena in many ways.

original: // de yang gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: // de yang gcig pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is single

original: dngos po thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde lhag par 'dis 'god par byed rtogs par byed /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // de lhag par 'dis 'god par byed rtogs par byed /
translated: because there is no distinction in all things.üîΩIt is called single array because it is that which arranges, causes to be understood,

original: 'dzin par byed pas bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pas bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and causes to be apprehended.

original: yang na gcig la lhag par 'dzin cing bkod pa ni bkod pa gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na gcig la lhag par 'dzin cing bkod pa ni bkod pa gcig pa yin no //
translated: Or, it is single array because it is that which is apprehended and arranged in one.

original: skye ba med pa spyod yul gyi tshig bla dgas yin no zhes brjod par bya ba yin ba las /
analyzed: skye ba med pa spyod yul gyi tshig bla dgas yin no zhes brjod par bya ba yin ba las /
translated: It is a term for the domain of non-arising.

original: skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dags so zhes gsungs pa ni skye ba med pa'i las ma gtogs par de'i spyod yul gang yin pa de med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dags so zhes gsungs pa ni skye ba med pa'i las ma gtogs par de'i spyod yul gang yin pa de med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is that there is no object of activity of non-arising apart from non-arising itself.

original: gzhan dag ni 'di skad du /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni 'di skad du /
translated: Others quote the following passage:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi dbyings la bkod pa yin no zhes 'don to //
analyzed: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi dbyings la bkod pa yin no zhes 'don to //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, this ‚Äúone-syllable‚Äù is the one-syllable of the dharma-dhƒÅtu.

original: 'di skad 'chad de /üîΩmdo la sogs pa'i chos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yi ge gcig sa bon @163a * //
analyzed: 'di skad 'chad de / mdo la sogs pa'i chos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yi ge gcig sa bon @163a * //
translated: The meaning is explained as follows:

original: mngon du byas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa sna tshogs par mthong bar byed /
analyzed: mngon du byas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa sna tshogs par mthong bar byed /
translated: The s≈´tras and so on are seen in various ways by the tathƒÅgatas through the manifestation of the seed syllable of the one-syllable, which is the characteristic of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: rtogs par byed /
analyzed: rtogs par byed /
translated: They are realized.üîΩThey are illuminated.

original: snang bar 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir 'di bkod pa gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: snang bar 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir 'di bkod pa gcig pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the one-syllable.

original: yang na chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin gang gis rtogs par byed //
analyzed: yang na chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin gang gis rtogs par byed //
translated: Or, through which samƒÅdhi is the empty dharma-dhƒÅtu realized?

original: mngon sum du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa yin no //
translated: It is manifested.

original: de yang gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang gcig pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is one,

original: stong pa nyid la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because emptiness is without difference.

original: de bas na bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
analyzed: de bas na bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
translated: Therefore, it is counted as the single array.

original: yang na dad pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dbyings sa bon thog ma med pa'i dus can ting nge 'dzin 'di la bkod /
analyzed: yang na dad pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dbyings sa bon thog ma med pa'i dus can ting nge 'dzin 'di la bkod /
translated: Or else, the realm of phenomena, the seeds of the phenomena of faith and so on, are arrayed in this concentration,

original: 'phel rgyas par gyur pas des na 'di ni chos kyi dbyings bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'phel rgyas par gyur pas des na 'di ni chos kyi dbyings bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
translated: and by their increase and development, it is counted as the single array of the realm of phenomena.

original: ming gi don bshad zin nas /
analyzed: ming gi don bshad zin nas /
translated: Having explained the meaning of the name,

original: de skyed pa'i thabs ston pa ni bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de skyed pa'i thabs ston pa ni bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: the method of generating it is taught: ‚ÄúOne who wishes to enter the single array concentration‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: sgom par byed pas thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri ba bya dgos pa ni bkod pa gcig pa'i don rtogs pa ni de thos pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgom par byed pas thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri ba bya dgos pa ni bkod pa gcig pa'i don rtogs pa ni de thos pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One who cultivates it must first ask questions about the perfection of wisdom, because understanding the meaning of the single array depends on hearing it.

original: de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: Then, by the sequence of thought and cultivation, one enters the concentration of the single procedure.

original: gzhan dag ni 'di skad du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pas thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan par bya /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni 'di skad du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pas thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan par bya /
translated: Others, however, read this as follows: ‚ÄúOne who wishes to enter the concentration of the single procedure should first listen to the perfection of wisdom.

original: mnyan nas don dang tshul yongs su dri bar bya'o zhes 'don to //
analyzed: mnyan nas don dang tshul yongs su dri bar bya'o zhes 'don to //
translated: Having listened, one should ask about the meaning and the method.‚Äù

original: 'di skad sgrogs te /
analyzed: 'di skad sgrogs te /
translated: This is what is proclaimed:

original: don ni tshig gi don to //
analyzed: don ni tshig gi don to //
translated: The meaning is the meaning of the words.

original: tshul ni bsdus pa'i don yin pas de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas par byas nas /
analyzed: tshul ni bsdus pa'i don yin pas de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas par byas nas /
translated: The method is the summarized meaning. Thus, having become skilled in the meaning of the perfection of wisdom,

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: one enters the concentration of the single procedure.üîΩWhy is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yod /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yod /
translated: Where is the method of the perfection of wisdom?

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang na yod /
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang na yod /
translated: Where is the single procedure concentration?

original: 'di gnyis yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos por ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di gnyis yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos por ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: These two are not in the relation of whole and part.

original: lan ni 'jam dpal skye ba med pa ni mi 'khrugs pa ste zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lan ni 'jam dpal skye ba med pa ni mi 'khrugs pa ste zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The reply is: ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, non-arising is unshakable.

original: de ltar byas na ting nge 'dzin dang 'gal ba med par gzung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar byas na ting nge 'dzin dang 'gal ba med par gzung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚Äù Thus, it should be grasped without contradicting meditative concentration.

original: mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni dkrug tu mi rung ba dkrug @163b par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni dkrug tu mi rung ba dkrug @163b par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúunshakable‚Äù is that it is not to be disturbed, it is not to be agitated.

original: de ci de lta na yul dang yul can gyi dngos por gzung bar bya 'am zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de ci de lta na yul dang yul can gyi dngos por gzung bar bya 'am zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it is asked whether it should be grasped as the relation of object and subject, the answer is no.

original: 'di ltar de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te /
translated: Because it is inconceivable.

original: gzung bar bya ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩ'di nyid kyi don ni bsam par mi bya ba /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // 'di nyid kyi don ni bsam par mi bya ba /
translated: The meaning is that it is not to be grasped.

original: bsam gyis mi lang ba'o zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi lang ba'o zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is that it is not to be thought, it is inconceivable.

original: so sor nang du rig pas gzung bar bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: so sor nang du rig pas gzung bar bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It is to be grasped by individual inner awareness.

original: yul dang yul can nyid du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: yul dang yul can nyid du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: but not as object and subject.

original: 'di ni skye ba rnam par 'jig pa'i chos kyi rnam pa can sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni skye ba rnam par 'jig pa'i chos kyi rnam pa can sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
translated: This is the concentration of meditation on the aspect of the destruction of arising.

original: skye ba med pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gsal bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gsal bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: And that non-arising is made clear in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bas na de don du gnyer bas de dri bar bya dgos pas 'di ni yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po yin no //üîΩci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas pa nyi tshe bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan yin nam zhe na ma yin no zhes bya bar 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi
analyzed: de bas na de don du gnyer bas de dri bar bya dgos pas 'di ni yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po yin no // ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas pa nyi tshe bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan yin nam zhe na ma yin no zhes bya bar 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi
translated: Therefore, one who seeks that should ask about it. Thus, this is the relation of whole to parts.üîΩIs the object of the perfection of wisdom the sign of the concentration of the single procedure, or not?

original: bu'am rigs kyi bu mos dben pa'i mal stan rnams bstan par bya zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bu'am rigs kyi bu mos dben pa'i mal stan rnams bstan par bya zhes gsungs so //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the son or daughter of noble family who wishes to enter the concentration of the single procedure should prepare an isolated bed and seat.

original: dben ba zhes bya ba ni btsun pa yin te /
analyzed: dben ba zhes bya ba ni btsun pa yin te /
translated: Isolated means pure.

original: sgyu dang kha gsag la sogs pa log pas 'tsho ba dang bral ba'o ;
analyzed: sgyu dang kha gsag la sogs pa log pas 'tsho ba dang bral ba'o ;
translated: It is free from wrong livelihood, such as hypocrisy, flattery, etc.

original: / ltung ba dang bcas shing sems la yo byad ma bsnyungs pa'i 'dam gyis gzer ba na sems gnas pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / ltung ba dang bcas shing sems la yo byad ma bsnyungs pa'i 'dam gyis gzer ba na sems gnas pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When one is afflicted by the mud of downfalls and the mind is not light, then meditative concentration of the mind is impossible.

original: mal stan rnams zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa la bya'o //
analyzed: mal stan rnams zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang la sogs pa la bya'o //
translated: Beds refers to temples, etc.

original: yang na dben pa ni gtsang ba la bya ste /
analyzed: yang na dben pa ni gtsang ba la bya ste /
translated: Alternatively, seclusion refers to cleanliness,

original: me tog gtor ba la sogs pas mdzes par bya'o //
analyzed: me tog gtor ba la sogs pas mdzes par bya'o //
translated: and one should beautify it by scattering flowers, etc.

original: de dag ni sems dang ba 'phel ba dang / rjes su mthun pa'i phyir dang / lha rnams 'du ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni sems dang ba 'phel ba dang / rjes su mthun pa'i phyir dang / lha rnams 'du ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they increase the clarity of mind and are conducive to it, and because they are the cause of the gathering of gods.

original: lha rnams 'dus na ni bsam gtan pa'i gzi byin 'phel bar byed /
analyzed: lha rnams 'dus na ni bsam gtan pa'i gzi byin 'phel bar byed /
translated: When the gods gather, the power of the meditator increases.

original: srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par yang byed do //
analyzed: srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par yang byed do //
translated: They also protect, guard, and conceal him.

original: yang na dben ba ni skye bo gnod par byed pa dang bral ba dgon pa la bya ste /
analyzed: yang na dben ba ni skye bo gnod par byed pa dang bral ba dgon pa la bya ste /
translated: Alternatively, seclusion refers to a forest free from people who do harm.

original: de dag ni sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because these are the causes of one-pointedness of mind.

original: de la gnas nas kyang 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la gnas nas kyang 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar bya'o //
translated: And having taken up that, one should delight in solitude.

original: 'du 'dzi ni gnyis te /
analyzed: 'du 'dzi ni gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of solitude:

original: lus kyi 'du 'dzi dang / yid kyi 'du @164a * //
analyzed: lus kyi 'du 'dzi dang / yid kyi 'du @164a * //
translated: bodily solitude and mental solitude.

original: 'dzi'o // de la lus kyi 'du 'dzi ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag dang stan cing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzi'o // de la lus kyi 'du 'dzi ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag dang stan cing gnas pa'o //
translated: Bodily solitude is to sit apart from householders and renunciates.

original: yid kyi 'du 'dzi ni gcig pu gnas pa na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa kun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'du 'dzi ni gcig pu gnas pa na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa kun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: Mental solitude is the non-occurrence of false thoughts, even when living with others.

original: 'du 'dzi de dag yang dag par srung bar dga' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du 'dzi de dag yang dag par srung bar dga' ba yin gyi /
translated: One should delight in guarding against those kinds of solitude,

original: 'du 'dzi med pa la mi dga' ba ni ma yin pa de ltar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'du 'dzi med pa la mi dga' ba ni ma yin pa de ltar bya ba yin te /
translated: but not in the absence of delight in solitude.

original: 'du 'dzi la dga' bas ni yon tan thams cad 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi la dga' bas ni yon tan thams cad 'joms par byed do //
translated: For delight in solitude destroys all faults.

original: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi ba dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs par spros pa la mngon par ma zhen pa ni myur du dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi ba dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs par spros pa la mngon par ma zhen pa ni myur du dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase without attending to any signs means that one should not be attached to the elaborations of I and mine, perceiver and perceived, and so forth. This is because one will then quickly manifest the meditative absorption that is not an object of apprehension.

original: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba dang / bde bar gnas pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas phyir sred pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyis thabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba dang / bde bar gnas pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas phyir sred pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyis thabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because attending to the signs of gain, honor, seeing, not seeing, and comfortable living is not a skillful means, since it is in accord with craving.

original: skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas zhes bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i chos nyid kyis de dang mthun par skyil mo krung bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa gcig la bya'o zhes bya ba ni de'i nang nas smos pas /
analyzed: skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas zhes bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i chos nyid kyis de dang mthun par skyil mo krung bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la bya'o zhes bya ba ni de'i nang nas smos pas /
translated: The phrase sitting with crossed legs means that one sits with crossed legs in a manner that is in accord with the nature of one-pointed mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la sogs pa gang yang rung ba ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la sogs pa gang yang rung ba ste /
translated: The phrase to a single tathƒÅgata means that one should do this in the presence of any tathƒÅgata, such as the Blessed AmitƒÅbha.

original: de yang de ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni zhes sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las 'byung ba'i rnam pa mtha' dag gam /üîΩmtha' dag ma yin pa gang yang rung ste /üîΩyid la bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang de ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni zhes sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las 'byung ba'i rnam pa mtha' dag gam / mtha' dag ma yin pa gang yang rung ste / yid la bya ba yin no //
translated: is the mental attention to all or to some of the aspects that occur in the recollection of the Buddha.üîΩAll dharmas are also to be attended to.

original: chos thams cad kyang yid la bya'o zhes bya ba ni yid la bya ba gnyi ga yang shes rab rgyas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang yid la bya'o zhes bya ba ni yid la bya ba gnyi ga yang shes rab rgyas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because both kinds of mental attention are causes for the increase of wisdom.

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúby way of nonapprehension‚Äù has already been explained.

original: kha cig ni sems can thams cad ces 'don gyi /
analyzed: kha cig ni sems can thams cad ces 'don gyi /
translated: Some recite ‚Äúall sentient beings‚Äù

original: chos thams cad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni ma yin no //
translated: but not ‚Äúall dharmas.‚Äù

original: de ltar na smras pa mgon med pa sdug bsngal ba de dag nam zhig na bdag de dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa yid la bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na smras pa mgon med pa sdug bsngal ba de dag nam zhig na bdag de dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa yid la bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should attend to the aspects of the statement: ‚ÄúWhen will I become a protector for those unprotected, a guide for travelers, a boat, a bridge, a ship, a raft for those who need one, a lamp for those who need light, a bed for those who need to sleep, and a slave for those who need a slave?‚Äù

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ba ni shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ba ni shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therein, the TathƒÅgata is to be attended to for the sake of increasing wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad yid la bya ba ni snying rje 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yid la bya ba ni snying rje 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: One should bring to mind all sentient beings in order to increase compassion.

original: de'i ming yang gzung bar @164b bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de'i ming yang gzung bar @164b bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: One should also retain the name of the Tathagata, means one should pay homage to the Blessed One Amitabha.

original: pad ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: pad ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: One should pay homage to the lotus-eyed one, etc.

original: de'i ming gzung ba thob na de'i yon tan dran pa rgyas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / spobs pa chen po la sogs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩming de yang rang gis brjod pa thos te don gyis rang gi ngo bo dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs ga la bzhugs pa'i phyogs nyi ma 'char ba 'am /
analyzed: de'i ming gzung ba thob na de'i yon tan dran pa rgyas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / spobs pa chen po la sogs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // ming de yang rang gis brjod pa thos te don gyis rang gi ngo bo dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs ga la bzhugs pa'i phyogs nyi ma 'char ba 'am /
translated: Because when one retains his name, the cause of the expansion of the recollection of his qualities is obtained, and because it is the cause of the analytical knowledge of great eloquence, etc.

original: gzhan yang rung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs pa der dga' ba dang gus pa bskyed nas phyogs der mngon du bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs pa der dga' ba dang gus pa bskyed nas phyogs der mngon du bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
translated: Having heard that name spoken by oneself, and having perceived its meaning by its own nature, one should stand facing the direction in which the Tathagata resides, whether it be the rising sun or any other direction, having generated joy and respect for the Tathagata who resides there.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' du mas yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' du mas yongs su bskor ba /
translated: The TathƒÅgata himself is seated on a lion throne made of various precious jewels, surrounded by many bodhisattvas,

original: yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi char mngon du 'bebs pa /
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi char mngon du 'bebs pa /
translated: pouring down a pleasant rain of Dharma.

original: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba /
analyzed: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba /
translated: He has the thirty-two marks,

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku mdzes par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku mdzes par byas pa yin no //
translated: and his body is beautified by the eighty minor marks.

original: yang dag par ni chos kyi sku yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par ni chos kyi sku yin te /
translated: But in reality he is the Dharma Body,

original: ji ltar mos pa bzhin du yid la byas na /
analyzed: ji ltar mos pa bzhin du yid la byas na /
translated: and when he is mentally attended to according to one‚Äôs wishes,

original: de yid la byas pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yid la byas pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: by attending to him one attends to the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, of the past, future, and present.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gcig yid la byas pas thams cad yid la byas par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gcig yid la byas pas thams cad yid la byas par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Why is that? He thinks: how can attending to one be attending to all?

original: gcig gi sku de ni thams cad kyi ma yin no zhes bsam pa'o //
analyzed: gcig gi sku de ni thams cad kyi ma yin no zhes bsam pa'o //
translated: The body of one is not the body of all.

original: lan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni tshogs dang chos kyi sku dang / 'gro ba'i don spyod pa mnyam pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: lan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni tshogs dang chos kyi sku dang / 'gro ba'i don spyod pa mnyam pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: The reply is: because the TathƒÅgatas are one. The assemblies, the Dharma Body, and the performance of the aims of beings are the same,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩsangs rgyas gcig ni kun gyi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // sangs rgyas gcig ni kun gyi ngo bo yin //
translated: but the Bodies of the TathƒÅgatas are not the same.üîΩOne Buddha is the essence of all,

original: sangs rgyas kun kyang gcig gi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun kyang gcig gi ngo bo yin //
translated: and all Buddhas are the essence of one.

original: gcig gi tshogs la sogs pa mthong gyur na //
analyzed: gcig gi tshogs la sogs pa mthong gyur na //
translated: When one sees the assembly of one,

original: sangs rgyas kun ni de yis mthong ba yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun ni de yis mthong ba yin //
translated: he sees all Buddhas.

original: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.

original: gzhan yang 'dir 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brangs te /üîΩsnying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi yi ge bsgoms pa'i bsam gtan dag gdul bya @165a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dir 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brangs te / snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi yi ge bsgoms pa'i bsam gtan dag gdul bya @165a * //
translated: Moreover, here we follow the method of the Noble Compendium of Truth.

original: rnams kyi spro ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa lta bu yin no //
analyzed: rnams kyi spro ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa lta bu yin no //
translated: The meditations on the syllables of the names of the TathƒÅgatas on the moon-discs in the heart are explained for the purpose of increasing the enthusiasm of those to be trained.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i 'bras bu rgyas par ston pa ni 'jam dpal ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i 'bras bu rgyas par ston pa ni 'jam dpal ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The extensive teaching of the result of this concentration is stated by ‚ÄúManjusri, just as the one Tathagata‚Äù and so on.
