original: skye ba med pa gcig gi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag tshad med par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gcig gi skye ba med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa gcig gi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag tshad med par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gcig gi skye ba med pa nyid yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúone should know the immeasurable varieties of Dharma categories of the one non-production‚Äù means that it is the one non-production itself.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs par chos ston par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs par chos ston par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúteaches the Dharma in various aspects‚Äù means that it teaches the Dharma in various ways.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bstan du zin kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi ngo bo mngon du ma byas pa dag 'di snyam du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang yin snyamüîΩdu sems na /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bstan du zin kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi ngo bo mngon du ma byas pa dag 'di snyam du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang yin snyam du sems na /
translated: Although the concentration has been taught in this way, those who have entered the Bodhisattva Vehicle, who have not actualized the intrinsic reality of concentration, might think, ‚ÄúWhat is this concentration of a single array?‚Äù

original: de dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi ngo bo bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: de dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi ngo bo bstan par mi nus te /
translated: If they think in this way, they will be unable to teach the intrinsic reality of concentration.

original: so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is to be realized personally.

original: 'on kyang de dag la 'di skad ces yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrags pa 'di yang dag par zung la 'dug cig dang zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag la 'di skad ces yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrags pa 'di yang dag par zung la 'dug cig dang zhes bya ste /
translated: However, they should be told, ‚ÄúYou should accept and retain this proclamation of the inconceivable virtues.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù Inconceivable means supreme.

original: yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa ni yon tan bshad pa ste /
analyzed: yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa ni yon tan bshad pa ste /
translated: Proclamation of virtues means explanation of virtues.

original: thabs su gyur pa bstan ma thag pa gang nas gsungs pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa'o //
analyzed: thabs su gyur pa bstan ma thag pa gang nas gsungs pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa'o //
translated: The inconceivable virtues are proclaimed in the immediately preceding explanation of the means of attainment.

original: de'i dngos po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of that is the proclamation of the inconceivable virtues.

original: 'di yang dag par zung la zhes bya ba ni yang dag par long la zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang dag par zung la zhes bya ba ni yang dag par long la zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: You should accept and retain means you should accept and retain it.

original: rgyun du gus par sbyor ba la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du gus par sbyor ba la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This means you should apply yourself to it with constant respect, etc.

original: ji lta ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan sangs rgyas kyi sku zad mi shes pa lta bu mthong zhing snang ba la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan sangs rgyas kyi sku zad mi shes pa lta bu mthong zhing snang ba la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one abides in the correct undertaking, one sees the qualities of this samƒÅdhi, such as seeing the inexhaustible buddha body and appearances, and so on.

original: gal te ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis sgrub cing zhum pa med par gyis shig / brtson 'grus lhong par ma byed cig / ji skad bstan pa'i tshul ni dben pa'i mal stan la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis sgrub cing zhum pa med par gyis shig / brtson 'grus lhong par ma byed cig / ji skad bstan pa'i tshul ni dben pa'i mal stan la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: If one practices in the manner taught, without being discouraged, without being overly diligent, the manner taught is the bed of solitude, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di dka' ba yin zhe na /üîΩting nge 'dzin 'di ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can dag dang / dngos por lta ba can dag nas /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di dka' ba yin zhe na / ting nge 'dzin 'di ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can dag dang / dngos por lta ba can dag nas /
translated: Why is this samƒÅdhi difficult?üîΩThis samƒÅdhi cannot be accomplished by those with the view of an object, those with the view of entity,

original: yod par lta ba can dag gi bar gyis @165b bsgrub par mi nus so zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: yod par lta ba can dag gi bar gyis @165b bsgrub par mi nus so zhes gsungs te /
translated: and so on, up to those with the view of existence.

original: 'di dag dmigs par lta ba ma yin pas de ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can no //
analyzed: 'di dag dmigs par lta ba ma yin pas de ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can no //
translated: Since these are not the view of an object, it is the view of an object.

original: yi ge kha cig las chos 'di dang rnam pa 'gal bar byed pa de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrub par mi nus so zhes 'byung ba de yang don de dag nyid yin te /
analyzed: yi ge kha cig las chos 'di dang rnam pa 'gal bar byed pa de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrub par mi nus so zhes 'byung ba de yang don de dag nyid yin te /
translated: Some texts say that those who act in opposition to this Dharma will not be able to achieve this concentration. That also has the same meaning.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'di ltar dmigs pa'i lta ba can ni 'di ltar chos 'di dang 'gal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dmigs pa'i lta ba can ni 'di ltar chos 'di dang 'gal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Those who have the view of a mental object act in opposition to this Dharma in this way.

original: gang yang chos la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur na zhes yi ge gzhan glegs bam kha cig las 'byung ba de yang rigs pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gang yang chos la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur na zhes yi ge gzhan glegs bam kha cig las 'byung ba de yang rigs pa kho na yin te /
translated: Also, some texts say that if one is obscured by the obscurations of the Dharma, that is also reasonable.

original: rkyen nye ba yin yang des bsgribs na de mi skye ba'i phyir zhes brjod de /
analyzed: rkyen nye ba yin yang des bsgribs na de mi skye ba'i phyir zhes brjod de /
translated: Even when the conditions are present, if one is obscured by that, it does not arise.

original: de log par sgrub pa'i bsam pa can yin te /
analyzed: de log par sgrub pa'i bsam pa can yin te /
translated: That is said because one has the intention to practice wrongly.

original: de'i sgrib pa zad pa med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrib pa zad pa med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is thought that one‚Äôs obscurations will not be exhausted.

original: kha cig las de de ltar bsgrubs na zhes 'byung ba de yang don de dag nyid kyis bshad zin to //
analyzed: kha cig las de de ltar bsgrubs na zhes 'byung ba de yang don de dag nyid kyis bshad zin to //
translated: Some texts say that if one practices in that way, that also has the same meaning as what has already been explained.

original: 'di ltar mtshan ma thams cad yid la byed pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i lta ba can gyis dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan ma thams cad yid la byed pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i lta ba can gyis dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, those who have the view of objectification, such as bringing to mind all signs, are delighted.

original: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig la rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che byi dor ma byas pa zhig bdog la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe bstan pas ni don 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig la rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che byi dor ma byas pa zhig bdog la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe bstan pas ni don 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The example that begins with ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, it is thus: for example, a certain man has a priceless jewel that is not well polished‚Äù clarifies this very point.

original: byi dor ma byas pa ni ma sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: byi dor ma byas pa ni ma sbyangs pa'o //
translated: Not well polished means not refined.

original: mi de la 'di skad du zhes bya ba de la zhes bya ba ni mi snga ma la'o //
analyzed: mi de la 'di skad du zhes bya ba de la zhes bya ba ni mi snga ma la'o //
translated: To that man, it is said thus. To that means to the previous man.

original: yang na gzhan gang yang rung ba la'o //
analyzed: yang na gzhan gang yang rung ba la'o //
translated: Or, it means to anyone else.

original: mi snga ma des mi phyi ma gang gis dris pa de la bzhag nas so //
analyzed: mi snga ma des mi phyi ma gang gis dris pa de la bzhag nas so //
translated: The previous man, having placed it with the subsequent man who asked about it,

original: de ltar na sbyin par ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na sbyin par ma byas pa ste /
translated: thus, it is not given.

original: gtan du byin pa med pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: gtan du byin pa med pa'i phyir ;
translated: Because it is not given permanently.

original: dper na btso blag mkhan la gos bcol ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na btso blag mkhan la gos bcol ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a cloth entrusted to a dyer.

original: de nyid kyi phyir byi dor byas pa'i phyir zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byi dor byas pa'i phyir zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúbecause it is polished.üîΩ‚Äù

original: yang na bdar ba bya ba'i don la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na bdar ba bya ba'i don la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, because the meaning of ‚Äúpolish‚Äù is not definite.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the explanation.

original: nor bu rin po che bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su sbyangs na shin tu rab tu grags pa'i yon tan nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba kho na yin pas /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su sbyangs na shin tu rab tu grags pa'i yon tan nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba kho na yin pas /
translated: Just as a precious gem, when polished, experiences the quality of great fame, so too this concentration, when polished, experiences the quality of great fame.

original: 'di la bag tsha bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la bag tsha bar mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not be timid about this.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gnyen po yod na 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni gnyen pos shin tu rtsa ba nas 'byin par srid pa yin te dper na nor bu rin po che bzhin no //üîΩgnyen po yod na @166a * //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gnyen po yod na 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni gnyen pos shin tu rtsa ba nas 'byin par srid pa yin te dper na nor bu rin po che bzhin no // gnyen po yod na @166a * //
translated: The application is this: that which is a phenomenon that decreases when an antidote exists is possible to be completely uprooted by the antidote, like a precious gem.

original: 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos can yang ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos can yang ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The phenomenon that decreases when an antidote exists is the stain of concentration. This is a natural reason.

original: ting nge 'dzin dri ma dang bral ba yang mthong ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dri ma dang bral ba yang mthong ste /
translated: One sees that concentration is free from stains.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: ji ltar sbyin pa'i gnas skabs na 'jug pa shin tu cher gyur pa na shin tu gsal ba la sogs par rigs pa yin pas ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sbyin pa'i gnas skabs na 'jug pa shin tu cher gyur pa na shin tu gsal ba la sogs par rigs pa yin pas ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not unestablished, because it is reasonable that when the engagement is very great at the time of giving, it is very clear, and so on.

original: de bzhin du mi mthun pa'i rkyen med na gnas brtan par 'dug pa gang gis cig car du ji ltar yang khyad par du byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi mthun pa'i rkyen med na gnas brtan par 'dug pa gang gis cig car du ji ltar yang khyad par du byed de /
translated: Similarly, when there is no opposing condition, by what does it remain stable? How is it distinguished all at once?

original: yang 'bad pa la mi ltos par de mngon par 'du byed pa khyad par du gyur pa'i bye brag gis gsal bar shes pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang 'bad pa la mi ltos par de mngon par 'du byed pa khyad par du gyur pa'i bye brag gis gsal bar shes pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Again, without depending on effort, it is established that the clear cognition is produced by the distinction of the special formation of that.

original: dper na nor bu rin po che rnam par dag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nor bu rin po che rnam par dag pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a pure precious gem.

original: ji skad gsungs pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: ji skad gsungs pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: And one who possesses the qualities as stated will have pure samƒÅdhi. This is a natural inference.

original: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas skye ba med pa gcig gi chos kyi rnam grangs tshad med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas skye ba med pa gcig gi chos kyi rnam grangs tshad med par shes par bya'o //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, having attained the samƒÅdhi of single arrangement, one should know the immeasurable Dharma discourses of a single non-arising.

original: 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba de'i shugs kyis 'ongs pa rnams rdzogs par byas nas dpe nye bar ston pas gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba de'i shugs kyis 'ongs pa rnams rdzogs par byas nas dpe nye bar ston pas gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: Here, the one who is about to enter, having completed the force of his arrival, makes it clear by means of an example.

original: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, it is like this:

original: dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa gang yang ma khyab pa mi gsal ba med de //
analyzed: dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa gang yang ma khyab pa mi gsal ba med de //
translated: The light rays of the orb of the sun do not illuminate or not pervade anywhere up to the orb's edge.

original: thams cad khyab po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad khyab po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that they pervade everything.

original: 'jam dpal de bzhin du ngas bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs nas rnyed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi ston te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal de bzhin du ngas bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs nas rnyed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi ston te /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, in the same way, having attained and entered this samƒÅdhi of the single array, I do not teach any Dharma that is not an exposition of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'on kyang ngas thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to zhes bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid gsung ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang ngas thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to zhes bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid gsung ngo //
translated: However, I proclaim with my own voice, 'I teach the perfection of wisdom everywhere.'

original: thob cig zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni snga ma snga ma'i tshig gi don gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: thob cig zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni snga ma snga ma'i tshig gi don gsal bar byed do //
translated: The words ‚Äúobtain it‚Äù and so on clarify the meaning of the preceding words.

original: yang na thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa la sogs pas go rims bzhin du thos pa dang zhugs pa dang rnyed pa dang sbyar te 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: yang na thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa la sogs pas go rims bzhin du thos pa dang zhugs pa dang rnyed pa dang sbyar te 'chad par byed do //
translated: Or else, they are explained respectively as being related to learning, reflection, and meditative development, by means of the knowledge that arises from learning and so on.

original: thams cad kyang bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa la brten nas yin par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa la brten nas yin par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
translated: The Lord has said that all of them are based on the meditative development of the concentration of a single basis.

original: sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i @166b chos 'chad pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang /
analyzed: sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i @166b chos 'chad pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang /
translated: In the assembly-circle of the former Sugatas,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa'i 'od zer gyis khyab bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa'i 'od zer gyis khyab bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the light-rays of the explanation of the perfection of wisdom pervade.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang thos pa dang sems pa la sogs pa rim gyis 'di zhes bya ba ni bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di shes na zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang thos pa dang sems pa la sogs pa rim gyis 'di zhes bya ba ni bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di shes na zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: Similarly, others also, by means of learning, reflection and so on, gradually, this is the concentration of a single basis.

original: / yi ge kha cig las 'di bzhin du shes na zhes 'byung ba der yang bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyegs pa yin la /
analyzed: / yi ge kha cig las 'di bzhin du shes na zhes 'byung ba der yang bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyegs pa yin la /
translated: Some texts read if one knows thus, and there also it refers to the samadhi of single placement.

original: 'di bzhin zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid sgom pa dper byed pa yin te ji ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu bsgoms pa de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang de ltar sgom par byed na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di bzhin zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid sgom pa dper byed pa yin te ji ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu bsgoms pa de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang de ltar sgom par byed na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus means that one's own meditation is the example. It is saying, Just as I have well cultivated this samadhi, if others also meditate in that way.

original: skyes bu chen po bstan pa des skye ba med pa dang / 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po bstan pa des skye ba med pa dang / 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: By that teaching of the Great Being, one does not see any phenomena that are contradictory to non-arising.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos so //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos so //
translated: Phenomena refers to the teachings such as the sutras.

original: skye ba med pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Non-arising means unborn.

original: 'gal ba ni mthun pa ste mdo sde la sogs pa thams cad skye ba med pa ston par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni mthun pa ste mdo sde la sogs pa thams cad skye ba med pa ston par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
translated: Contradictory means compatible. It means that everything such as the sutras teach non-arising.

original: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ci ston ce na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ci ston ce na /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, it is thus: from the four directions of the great ocean, etc. What does this passage show?

original: byed pa po tha dad pa med pas chos rnams tha dad pa med par ma zad kyi /
analyzed: byed pa po tha dad pa med pas chos rnams tha dad pa med par ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only are phenomena undifferentiated because there is no differentiation of agents,

original: byed pa po tha dad pa yin du zin kyang chos rnams ni don dam par tha dad pa med pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po tha dad pa yin du zin kyang chos rnams ni don dam par tha dad pa med pa kho na yin te /
translated: even if agents were differentiated, phenomena are undifferentiated in the ultimate,

original: thams cad skye ba med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad skye ba med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they all have the nature of non-arising.

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas skyes bu bzhi zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas skyes bu bzhi zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa yin te /
translated: The four men born in the four directions of the great ocean are an illustration.

original: thams cad nas thams cad kyis zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad nas thams cad kyis zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that it is from everywhere and by everyone.

original: 'jam dpal de bzhin du ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad ni zhes bya ba de la yang /
analyzed: 'jam dpal de bzhin du ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad ni zhes bya ba de la yang /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, likewise, whatever Dharma I have taught, etc. Here,

original: ngas zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: ngas zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúI‚Äù is an illustration.

original: phyogs thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yang rig par bya'o skye ba med pa de kho na nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas chos 'chad pa'i chu len pa thams cad kun gyis tha dad pa med pa kho na len to zhes bya
analyzed: phyogs thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yang rig par bya'o skye ba med pa de kho na nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas chos 'chad pa'i chu len pa thams cad kun gyis tha dad pa med pa kho na len to zhes bya
translated: All those who take the water of Dharma from the great ocean of the unarisen reality take it as one and the same, without any difference.

original: ba bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: ba bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: This is the summary meaning.

original: 'jam dpal de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci ston kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci ston kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin no //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, thus, when a son or daughter of good family has attained this samƒÅdhi, whatever they teach... and so on is the conclusion.

original: gang ci ston kyang de dag thams cad mi @167a * //
analyzed: gang ci ston kyang de dag thams cad mi @167a * //
translated: Whatever they teach, all of that...

original: dmigs pa'i tshul du ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni chos gang ci ston kyang de dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa de dag thams cad la ston par 'gyur ro zhes bshad par bya ba de ltar yin na ni legs pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul du ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni chos gang ci ston kyang de dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa de dag thams cad la ston par 'gyur ro zhes bshad par bya ba de ltar yin na ni legs pa yin no //
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúwhatever is taught is taught as non-arisen, non-occurring, and unreal,‚Äù then it would be good to explain that ‚Äúwhatever is taught is taught as all of those non-arisen, non-occurring, and unreal phenomena.‚Äù

original: yang na gang ci ston pa de dag ma skyes pa'i don ston pa yin te /
analyzed: yang na gang ci ston pa de dag ma skyes pa'i don ston pa yin te /
translated: Or, whatever is taught is taught as having the meaning of non-arisen.

original: de kho na nyid ni de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because reality is its essence.

original: de yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa kho na ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa kho na ston pa yin no //
translated: And that is taught by that son of a good family or daughter of a good family as just non-arisen and unreal.

original: ston pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi myur du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa bsgrubs nas ring po mi thogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bas gong nas gong du phun sum tshogs pa mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyu nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di yin par bstan pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhan yang
analyzed: ston pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi myur du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa bsgrubs nas ring po mi thogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bas gong nas gong du phun sum tshogs pa mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyu nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di yin par bstan pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhan yang
translated: In order to demonstrate that this samƒÅdhi is the cause of the supreme excellence of higher and higher, it is said, ‚ÄúMoreover, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who attains this samƒÅdhi‚Ä¶‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gang gi tshe /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gang gi tshe /
translated: Moreover, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, when the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva

original: bdag gi dbyings nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi thabs myur ba gzhan yang ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi dbyings nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi thabs myur ba gzhan yang ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: By ‚Äúfrom the realm of self‚Äù and so forth, he demonstrates another method for quickly attaining perfect enlightenment.

original: de lta bu'i bzod pa can ni de'i 'dod pa la bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bzod pa can ni de'i 'dod pa la bya'o //
translated: One who has such patience should be understood as having that desire.

original: de lta bu'i bzod pa can 'di ni ma skyes pa la bzod pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bzod pa can 'di ni ma skyes pa la bzod pa yin te /
translated: Such a patient person is patient with what has not arisen.

original: shin tu myur bar byang chub 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu myur bar byang chub 'thob pa'o //
translated: He will attain enlightenment very quickly.

original: rnam par mi rtog par bzod pa yang de'i thabs nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog par bzod pa yang de'i thabs nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the patience of nonconceptuality is also the method for that,

original: gang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / byang chub kyi chos rnams la mi sems pa'i bzod pa can gyi rigs kyi bu de yang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la gang yang bla na med pa
analyzed: gang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / byang chub kyi chos rnams la mi sems pa'i bzod pa can gyi rigs kyi bu de yang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la gang yang bla na med pa
translated: the text says, ‚ÄúThe son of good lineage who is patient with the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment and the dharmas of enlightenment does not think about them. That son of good lineage will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.‚Äù

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems pa ni 'dzin pa 'am gzung ba la sogs par mi rtog ces bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems pa ni 'dzin pa 'am gzung ba la sogs par mi rtog ces bya ba'i don te /
translated: Not thinking about the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment means not conceiving of it as something to be grasped or something that grasps it, and so on.

original: byang chub kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mi sems pa 'di'i bzod pa can de yang yin te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mi sems pa 'di'i bzod pa can de yang yin te /
translated: He is patient with the thought that he will not attain the dharmas of enlightenment.

original: @167b byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: @167b byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The qualities of the bodhisattva are the spiritual levels and the transcendences.

original: de dag gis ni de la bzod pa yang byang chub dang nye ba'i chos kyi rgyu nyid yin par ston pa na byang chub kyi rgyu yin par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni de la bzod pa yang byang chub dang nye ba'i chos kyi rgyu nyid yin par ston pa na byang chub kyi rgyu yin par ston pa yin no //
translated: When it is shown that patience is the cause of the qualities that are conducive to enlightenment, it is shown that it is the cause of enlightenment.

original: yang na byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yod pa'i don te /
analyzed: yang na byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yod pa'i don te /
translated: Alternatively, the phrase the qualities of the bodhisattva, etc. has the sense of existence.

original: byang chub la ma 'dres pa'i chos gang yin ba yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: byang chub la ma 'dres pa'i chos gang yin ba yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: That which exists as the unmixed quality of enlightenment is the bodhisattva.

original: de yang yod pa de dag yin pas de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de yang yod pa de dag yin pas de skad ces bya ste /
translated: And that is the existence of those, hence the expression.

original: de dag gis ni dngos po de nyid rgyur bstan te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni dngos po de nyid rgyur bstan te /
translated: By this, that entity is shown to be the cause.

original: byang chub ni byed pa med pa'o zhes de ltar bzod pa ni myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub ni byed pa med pa'o zhes de ltar bzod pa ni myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Enlightenment is without action. Thus, patience is the cause of the swift attainment of buddhahood.

original: byang chub ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir sems can gyis thob par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi tshogs rnams la zhes bya ba'i tshig lhag ma ste /
analyzed: byang chub ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir sems can gyis thob par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba la byang chub kyi tshogs rnams la zhes bya ba'i tshig lhag ma ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the accumulations for enlightenment‚Äù is an ellipsis.

original: byang chub ni sems can gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi tshogs rnams la sems can sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: byang chub ni sems can gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi tshogs rnams la sems can sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Enlightenment is not attained by sentient beings through the accumulations for enlightenment, because the Bhagavat does not cause sentient beings to engage in the accumulations for enlightenment in order to attain buddhahood.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is nonconceptual.üîΩEven though the wheel of activity for the benefit of sentient beings occurs spontaneously, the Teacher is always in equipoise.

original: lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sems can gyi don spyod pa'i 'khor lo byung yang ston pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no zhes de lta bu'i bzod pa de yang myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin par bshad do
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sems can gyi don spyod pa'i 'khor lo byung yang ston pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no zhes de lta bu'i bzod pa de yang myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin par bshad do
translated: Thus it is said that such patience is not a cause of the swift attainment of unexcelled enlightenment.

original: // gzhan las skyes pa med par bzod pa mi 'byung gi /'on kyang smon pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: // gzhan las skyes pa med par bzod pa mi 'byung gi /'on kyang smon pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa 'byung ste /
translated: Patience does not arise without arising from another, but patience arises in relation to the non-existent phenomena that are wished for.

original: gang yang byang chub ni sangs rgyas nyid la mi smon zhes 'byung ba ni 'di ltar bshad de /
analyzed: gang yang byang chub ni sangs rgyas nyid la mi smon zhes 'byung ba ni 'di ltar bshad de /
translated: The statement nor does one aspire to enlightenment is explained as follows.

original: sangs rgyas nyid la yang smon pa med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid la yang smon pa med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that one does not even aspire to buddhahood.

original: de ltar chos thams cad la byang chub dang mnyam par mos pa yang myur du byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad la byang chub dang mnyam par mos pa yang myur du byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the conviction that all phenomena are the same as enlightenment also quickly accomplishes enlightenment, it is said:

original: chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: All phenomena are the qualities of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mnyam pa nyid kyis na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mnyam pa nyid kyis na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ste /
translated: All phenomena are called the qualities of the Buddha because they are the same as the qualities of the Buddha.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos gnyis su med pa ltar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos gnyis su med pa ltar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as the qualities of the Buddha are nondual, so are all phenomena.

original: zhum par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pa'i phyir bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhum par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pa'i phyir bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúHe does not become fainthearted‚Äù means that he thinks, ‚ÄúI have attained the qualities of a Buddha, because all dharmas are the dharmas of a Buddha.

original: @168a * // de ltar mos shing zhes bya ba ni yal bar 'dor bar mi byed pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: @168a * // de ltar mos shing zhes bya ba ni yal bar 'dor bar mi byed pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving such conviction‚Äù means that he does not give up.

original: chos kyi dbyings la glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bar bya'o zhes de ltar yang mos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bar bya'o zhes de ltar yang mos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has conviction that the dharmadhƒÅtu is to be freed from adventitious stains.

original: byang chub las phyir ldog pa ni de nas slar ldog pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub las phyir ldog pa ni de nas slar ldog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHe does not turn back from enlightenment‚Äù means that he does not turn away from it.

original: de'i dngos po ni phyir ldog pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni phyir ldog pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúIts state‚Äù is the state of not turning away.

original: nang gi 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i tshogs yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nang gi 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i tshogs yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has the collection of inner changes, etc.

original: phyir ldog pa ma yin pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'o //
analyzed: phyir ldog pa ma yin pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHe does not turn back‚Äù means that he does not turn away.

original: de lta bu'i bzod pa can de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ma bral bar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bzod pa can de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ma bral bar brjod par bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne who has such patience‚Äù should be said to be ‚Äúnot separated from all the qualities of a Buddha,‚Äù

original: byang chub dang nye bar gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub dang nye bar gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is close to enlightenment.

original: 'dir thabs bstan pa la sems la the tshom med pa des kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir thabs bstan pa la sems la the tshom med pa des kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, in order to show that the method is taught, and that one who is without doubt in the mind will quickly attain it,

original: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba de yang phyir mi ldog par bshad de zhes bya ba'i rjes su snyegs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba de yang phyir mi ldog par bshad de zhes bya ba'i rjes su snyegs so //
translated: the passage ‚Äúthat son of the family or daughter of the family who, having heard this teaching, will not be confused and will not be doubtful, that one is also explained as irreversible‚Äù is to be supplied.

original: gal te thabs de dag gis byang chub byas pa yin na de 'dus byas yin par thal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te thabs de dag gis byang chub byas pa yin na de 'dus byas yin par thal bar 'gyur la /
translated: If enlightenment is made by those methods, it would follow that it is compounded.

original: 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir spong bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir spong bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because it is compounded, it would be abandoned.

original: de ltar gyur dang byang chub pa po dang / byang chub par bya ba yang yod par bya dgos so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur dang byang chub pa po dang / byang chub par bya ba yang yod par bya dgos so //
translated: And if that were so, then the one who is enlightened and the one who is to be enlightened would have to exist.

original: de ltar gyur na de nyid stong pa nyid dang 'gal lo zhes kha cig ni dogs pa skyes so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na de nyid stong pa nyid dang 'gal lo zhes kha cig ni dogs pa skyes so //
translated: Some have the doubt that if that were so, it would contradict emptiness.

original: de bas na 'dus byas nyid yin par mngon par zhen pa bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na 'dus byas nyid yin par mngon par zhen pa bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to remove the adherence to the very idea that it is compounded,

original: bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu las nges par byung ba lags sam zhes zhus te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu las nges par byung ba lags sam zhes zhus te /
translated: Blessed One, does unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment arise from a cause?

original: de ltar gyur na de dag gis byang chub dang / byang chub pa po dang / byang chub par bya ba rnams 'khrul pa med pa ma yin par dogs so zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na de dag gis byang chub dang / byang chub pa po dang / byang chub par bya ba rnams 'khrul pa med pa ma yin par dogs so zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: If that is so, then it is feared that they would not be without error with regard to enlightenment, the one who is enlightened, and the one who is to be enlightened.

original: rgyu las nges par byung ba ni skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu las nges par byung ba ni skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Arising from a cause means that it is produced.

original: lan ni 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lan ni 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, that is not so.‚Äù

original: bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni /
analyzed: bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni /
translated: The explanation of what was taught is:

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni rgyu med cing rgyu las nges par byung ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩ'o na dogs pa yang med la /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni rgyu med cing rgyu las nges par byung ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no // 'o na dogs pa yang med la /
translated: Unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment does not have a cause and does not arise from a cause.

original: dris pa yang med par ci'i phyir byang chub kyi rgyu nyid 'gog par byed ce na /
analyzed: dris pa yang med par ci'i phyir byang chub kyi rgyu nyid 'gog par byed ce na /
translated: Well then, since there is no doubt and no question, why does he refute the cause of enlightenment?

original: @168b rgyu gang yang med pa dang / 'bras bu gang yang med do zhes shin tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @168b rgyu gang yang med pa dang / 'bras bu gang yang med do zhes shin tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to teach that there is no cause at all and no effect at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa rgyu nyid yin par lan grangs du mar bstan zin la /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa rgyu nyid yin par lan grangs du mar bstan zin la /
translated: Why is that? The thought is this: the inconceivable play of the buddhas is the cause itself, as has been taught many times.

original: bstan ma thag pa yang 'bras bu nyid yin par bstan pa yin na /
analyzed: bstan ma thag pa yang 'bras bu nyid yin par bstan pa yin na /
translated: And just what has been taught is the effect itself.

original: ci'i phyir rgyu med cing rgyu las nges par byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rgyu med cing rgyu las nges par byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: So why is it that it is causeless and does not arise from a cause?

original: skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa ni rgyu yang ma yin la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa ni rgyu yang ma yin la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan yin no //
translated: The response is: ‚ÄúNon-arising and non-entityness are not the cause . . . ‚Äù

original: dngos po 'di'i skye ba yod pa ma yin pas skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po 'di'i skye ba yod pa ma yin pas skye ba med pa'o //
translated: Since the arising of this entity does not exist, there is non-arising.

original: de bzhin du 'di'i dngos po med pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di'i dngos po med pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Similarly, this is called non-entityness.

original: gdul bya'i bye brag nye bar gnas pa la ltos nas khyab pa kho nar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gdul bya'i bye brag nye bar gnas pa la ltos nas khyab pa kho nar bstan pa yin no //
translated: But in dependence on the presence of the distinctions among those to be tamed, it is taught to be pervasive.

original: de'i phyogs kyi chos kho na yin par ma gsungs kyang khong du chud par bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyogs kyi chos kho na yin par ma gsungs kyang khong du chud par bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: Although it is not stated that it is only the attribute of that, it is to be understood.

original: sbyor ba ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The application is to be made in the following way:

original: skye ba med pa'am dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu ma yin zhing rgyu las nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'am dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu ma yin zhing rgyu las nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is non-production or non-entity is not a cause and does not arise from a cause,

original: mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like the son of a barren woman and so on.üîΩAnd non-production and non-entity are enlightenment,

original: skye ba med pa dang dngos po med pa yang byang chub yin pas zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang dngos po med pa yang byang chub yin pas zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: this is the contradiction with the pervasion.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni thabs kyis bskyed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa yin na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni thabs kyis bskyed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa yin na /
translated: The thought behind ‚Äúwhy is that?‚Äù is that the display of all Buddhas is generated by means,

original: skye ba dang dngos po dang bral ba la ni de lta bu mi srid do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: skye ba dang dngos po dang bral ba la ni de lta bu mi srid do zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: but such is not possible for one who is devoid of production and entity.

original: lan ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lan ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The answer is ‚Äúbecause all phenomena are non-produced.‚Äù

original: brtags pa'i ngo bo 'chang ba thams cad ma skyes ma 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub 'di yang de'i nang du gtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: brtags pa'i ngo bo 'chang ba thams cad ma skyes ma 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub 'di yang de'i nang du gtogs pa yin te /
translated: The nature of all things that are imagined is unborn and unarisen, and enlightenment is included in that.

original: 'di ltar byang chub par bya ba la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa de la ni pha rol po dag the tshom du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub par bya ba la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa de la ni pha rol po dag the tshom du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the other side of those things that are to be enlightened, etc., is not real, and so the others are doubtful.

original: gang yang de ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis ma yin zhing byang chub gang yin pa de yang dag pa yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus mod kyi /
analyzed: gang yang de ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis ma yin zhing byang chub gang yin pa de yang dag pa yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus mod kyi /
translated: Moreover, it cannot be said that ‚Äúit is not all imaginations, and that enlightenment is real.‚Äù

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: However, from the perspective of conventional truth,

original: de rgyu med pa ma yin rgyu las nges par ma byung ba ma yin no zhes de ltar bshad de /
analyzed: de rgyu med pa ma yin rgyu las nges par ma byung ba ma yin no zhes de ltar bshad de /
translated: it is explained that ‚Äúit is not without a cause, and it does not definitely arise from a cause.‚Äù

original: de thabs bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan yang sngar bstan pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyang don dam par ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin @169a * //
analyzed: de thabs bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro // gzhan yang sngar bstan pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyang don dam par ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin @169a * //
translated: Because that is taught as the method.

original: pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, as previously taught, enlightenment is also taught in that way because, ultimately, it has the nature of non-arising.

original: de ltar byang chub kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bsal ba'i don 'di thos nas nur bar mi 'gyur ba ste yal bar mi 'dor ba de yang phyir mi ldog pa yin par ngas bshad do zhes bya ba 'di yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus ma byas pa
analyzed: de ltar byang chub kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bsal ba'i don 'di thos nas nur bar mi 'gyur ba ste yal bar mi 'dor ba de yang phyir mi ldog pa yin par ngas bshad do zhes bya ba 'di yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus ma byas pa
translated: Having heard this teaching on the meaning of the elimination of the cause and effect of enlightenment, he does not turn back, does not abandon it. I explain that he is also irreversible.

original: nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs gzhan bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs gzhan bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is also a teaching on another method of entering into the unconditioned.

original: de 'dus ma byas yin par don ma rtogs pa ni nur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'dus ma byas yin par don ma rtogs pa ni nur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One who has not understood the meaning of the unconditioned will turn back.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks like this:

original: byang chub kyi tshogs la 'bad pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: byang chub kyi tshogs la 'bad pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of striving for the accumulations of enlightenment?

original: de ni bya bar nus pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: de ni bya bar nus pa yang ma yin la /
translated: It is not even possible to do it.üîΩAnd if it is done, there is nothing at all that is done.

original: byas na yang ci yang byed pa med do zhes de ltar sngar gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: byas na yang ci yang byed pa med do zhes de ltar sngar gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas te /
translated: Thus, having first questioned the disciples from that point of view,

original: lhag par dris nas der thabs mdor bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag par dris nas der thabs mdor bstan pa yin no //
translated: the method was briefly taught there.

original: der dang po nas bzung nas gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'i rgyu can 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der dang po nas bzung nas gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'i rgyu can 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: From there, beginning with the first, it is established by the cause of striving in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bas na bdag nyid thams cad 'dod pas sbyor bar bya ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na bdag nyid thams cad 'dod pas sbyor bar bya ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that all of oneself should be applied to desire,

original: 'jam dpal de lta bas na dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de lta bas na dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Manjusri, therefore, a monk or nun, etc. is stated; it is easy to understand.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa med par skyabs su 'gro ba dang / rab tu byung ba la sogs pa ni byang chub kyi ched du brtson ba 'jebs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa med par skyabs su 'gro ba dang / rab tu byung ba la sogs pa ni byang chub kyi ched du brtson ba 'jebs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: The condensed meaning is: Without conviction in the perfection of wisdom, going for refuge, renunciation, etc. are not the means of engaging in the practice for the sake of enlightenment.

original: yang gang dag sems pa mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba'i tshul tsam nyid kyis smon lam btab cing sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'jug na /
analyzed: yang gang dag sems pa mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba'i tshul tsam nyid kyis smon lam btab cing sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'jug na /
translated: Moreover, if one thinks, By merely the method of the sutra collection, the abhidharma, and the vinaya, I will make aspirations and engage in generosity, etc.,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: I will accomplish the practice of the bodhisattva training,

original: bsgrubs nas kyang myur ba kho nar byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: bsgrubs nas kyang myur ba kho nar byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: and having accomplished it, I will quickly attain enlightenment,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ci dgos snyam pa la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ci dgos snyam pa la /
translated: One might think, What need is there to strive in the perfection of wisdom?

original: de'i phyir 'di skad ces 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi slob pa de byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skad ces 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi slob pa de byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, Manjusri, any son or daughter of noble family who does not train in this profound perfection of wisdom does not train in the bodhisattva training.

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson ba med par ni shes rab rnam par dag pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson ba med par ni shes rab rnam par dag pa med do //
translated: Thus, without striving in the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of wisdom will not be purified.

original: de med par ni dge ba'i tshogs rnam par dag pa med do //
analyzed: de med par ni dge ba'i tshogs rnam par dag pa med do //
translated: Without that, the accumulation of virtue will not be purified.

original: de med par ni dge ba'i tshogs rnam par dag pa med do //
analyzed: de med par ni dge ba'i tshogs rnam par dag pa med do //
translated: Without that, the accumulation of virtue will not be purified.

original: de med par ni byang chub med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de med par ni byang chub med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Without that, enlightenment will not be attained.

original: don 'di @169b nyid dpes gsal bar byed pa ni 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na 'byung po'i grong khyer dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: don 'di @169b nyid dpes gsal bar byed pa ni 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na 'byung po'i grong khyer dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: This very meaning is clarified by an example: Manjusri, it is like this, for example, a city of the gandharvas, etc.

original: 'byung po'i grong khyer ni ljon shing rnams so //
analyzed: 'byung po'i grong khyer ni ljon shing rnams so //
translated: The cities of spirits are the trees.

original: sa bon gyi tshogs ni sa bon lnga'o //
analyzed: sa bon gyi tshogs ni sa bon lnga'o //
translated: The collection of seeds are the five seeds.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi yang thabs gzhan gyis dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi yang thabs gzhan gyis dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Don‚Äôt the virtuous qualities of those in the ≈örƒÅvaka Vehicle increase and expand through other methods?

original: ji skad du rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji skad du rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur /
translated: As it is said, ‚ÄúIf one possesses these seven things that create merit with material basis, one‚Äôs merit will always increase and expand without interruption.

original: bsod nams skye ba kho nar 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bsod nams skye ba kho nar 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
translated: Only merit will be produced.‚Äù

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la ni yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la ni yod pa ma yin na /
translated: If they do not listen to the perfection of wisdom,

original: de ji ltar 'di skad du /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'di skad du /
translated: how is it that it is said:

original: 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ces bya ba la sogs gsungs she na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ces bya ba la sogs gsungs she na /
translated: ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, in the same way, all the virtuous qualities of bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on?

original: 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slu bar mi byed do zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slu bar mi byed do zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus, it does not deceive with regard to supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: thabs med par ni bskal pa bye ba grangs med pas kyang byang chub mi thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs med par ni bskal pa bye ba grangs med pas kyang byang chub mi thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, without skillful means, one does not attain enlightenment even in countless eons.

original: gang la la dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba ma mchis sam zhes bya ba ni ci zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: gang la la dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba ma mchis sam zhes bya ba ni ci zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúWill there be any who will take it up, up to who will teach it?‚Äù means ‚ÄúWill there be any who will take it up, up to who will teach it?‚Äù

original: yang na tshig zur du bklag go //
analyzed: yang na tshig zur du bklag go //
translated: Or, it is read as a separate sentence.

original: don 'di nyid sngar yang 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos dris pa kho na yin pas zlos pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: don 'di nyid sngar yang 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos dris pa kho na yin pas zlos pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Since this very meaning was asked by noble MahƒÅkƒÅ≈õyapa before, is it not a fault of repetition?

original: de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: der ni 'phags pa 'jam pa'i gsung gis bshad pa la dris pa yin gyi ;
analyzed: der ni 'phags pa 'jam pa'i gsung gis bshad pa la dris pa yin gyi ;
translated: There, it was asked about the explanation by the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is the BhagavƒÅn‚Äôs own statement.

original: lan du sngar bstan pa de nyid bka' stsal pa ni /
analyzed: lan du sngar bstan pa de nyid bka' stsal pa ni /
translated: The answer is the very same as taught before.

original: 'jam dpal gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di da ltar gyi tshe la thob nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di da ltar gyi tshe la thob nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, those who have attained this teaching of the perfection of wisdom in this lifetime and so on.

original: tshe 'di brjes nas zhes bya ba ni tshe 'phos shing tshe gzhan du gyur nas so //
analyzed: tshe 'di brjes nas zhes bya ba ni tshe 'phos shing tshe gzhan du gyur nas so //
translated: Having passed beyond this life means having transmigrated and changed to another life.

original: mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis so //üîΩgal te smon lam gyi dbang gis bshad pa 'di rna bas thos pa yin na de dag de ltar bsod nams chung ngus kyang rna bas thos @170a * //
analyzed: mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis so // gal te smon lam gyi dbang gis bshad pa 'di rna bas thos pa yin na de dag de ltar bsod nams chung ngus kyang rna bas thos @170a * //
translated: By the method of non-cultivation means by the method of not being attached to cultivation.

original: par ji ltar snang zhe na /
analyzed: par ji ltar snang zhe na /
translated: If this explanation is heard by the ear through the power of aspiration, how is it that they appear to hear it with little merit?üîΩTherefore, it is said,

original: de'i phyir de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar nga mi 'chad do zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar nga mi 'chad do zhes gsungs te /
translated: I do not explain that their roots of virtue are small.

original: gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi chung ba de la de skad ces bstan to //
analyzed: gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi chung ba de la de skad ces bstan to //
translated: That is taught for those whose roots of virtue are not small.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention is this:

original: gang dag gis tshe rabs gzhan na bcom ldan 'das kyis yum 'di ma thos pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // mi gsod pa la sogs pa sdig pa chen po'i bsam pa rtag tu bsten cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas pa dang /
analyzed: gang dag gis tshe rabs gzhan na bcom ldan 'das kyis yum 'di ma thos pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // mi gsod pa la sogs pa sdig pa chen po'i bsam pa rtag tu bsten cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas pa dang /
translated: Those who in other lives did not hear this Mother of the Lord, and who constantly relied on, cultivated, and increased the intention to commit great evil such as harming the Three Jewels and killing,

original: bshad pa la sogs pa cung zad tsam yang ma byas /
analyzed: bshad pa la sogs pa cung zad tsam yang ma byas /
translated: and who did not even slightly explain it and so forth,

original: ma bzung ba de lta bu de dag ngan song du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhan dag ci'i phyir 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma bzung ba de lta bu de dag ngan song du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhan dag ci'i phyir 'gyur te /
translated: will go to the lower realms. Why would others not do so?

original: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa kho nas de dag gi rnam par smin pa thang cig yud tsam zhig myong nas sdig pa'i tshogs chen po de dag zhu byang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa kho nas de dag gi rnam par smin pa thang cig yud tsam zhig myong nas sdig pa'i tshogs chen po de dag zhu byang bar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by merely listening to the perfection of wisdom, the ripening of those great masses of evil will be burned away after being experienced for just a moment, just an instant.

original: gal te gus pa dang rtag tu sbyor ba la sogs pa med pas ni rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa'i skye ba blangs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gus pa dang rtag tu sbyor ba la sogs pa med pas ni rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa'i skye ba blangs pa ma yin no //
translated: But if they lack respect, constant application, and so forth, they will not take birth in a form that is in every respect attractive and beautiful.

original: gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar 'bras bu bzang po 'thob pa yin no /
analyzed: gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar 'bras bu bzang po 'thob pa yin no /
translated: If this Dharma teaching is thus the attainment of a good result,üîΩis it to be explained to all who desire it?

original: de 'dod pa thams cad la bshad par bya ba yin nam zhe na ma yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de 'dod pa thams cad la bshad par bya ba yin nam zhe na ma yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir /
translated: To respond, ‚ÄúNo,‚Äù the root verse states:

original: 'jam dpal gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan 'dod par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan 'dod par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, whoever desires to listen to this teaching of the perfection of wisdom...

original: 'di yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir bstan to //
analyzed: 'di yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir bstan to //
translated: This is also taught in order to demonstrate that.üîΩWhy is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni dad pa dang / brtson 'grus gnyis de ltar rgyu dam pa yin na thos nas ma dad pa 'am nur bar ji ltar 'gyur zhes bsams pa'o ;
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni dad pa dang / brtson 'grus gnyis de ltar rgyu dam pa yin na thos nas ma dad pa 'am nur bar ji ltar 'gyur zhes bsams pa'o ;
translated: If faith and diligence are the highest causes, then how could one who has heard [the Dharma] become faithless or turn back?

original: / lan ni /
analyzed: / lan ni /
translated: The response is:

original: 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang yongs su grub par na bstam te zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang yongs su grub par na bstam te zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: Because in this [Dharma], no phenomenon is established at all...

original: don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning has already been explained.

original: 'di skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ste /
translated: This is stated:

original: sems can de dag phal cher ni chos la mngon par zhen pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can de dag phal cher ni chos la mngon par zhen pa yin te /
translated: Most of those sentient beings are attached to the reality of things.

original: de yod par bshad pa drang ba'i don gzhan dag la dga' ba yin no //
analyzed: de yod par bshad pa drang ba'i don gzhan dag la dga' ba yin no //
translated: They delight in other scriptures that teach the existence of things.

original: 'dir ni de dag yod par yang ma bshad de /
analyzed: 'dir ni de dag yod par yang ma bshad de /
translated: But here, the existence of things is not taught.

original: 'dir bshad pa ni gtsor don dam pa ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa ni gtsor don dam pa ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The teaching here is primarily of the ultimate.

original: de dag gi tha snyad kyi bden pa'i nang du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi tha snyad kyi bden pa'i nang du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is included in the conventional truth.

original: de bas na 'dod pa don med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar ma dad pa dang nur bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na 'dod pa don med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar ma dad pa dang nur bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because their desire is meaningless, they will certainly lose faith and turn away.

original: @170b bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am /
analyzed: @170b bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am /
translated: ‚ÄúBlessed One, if any monks or nuns,

original: dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag la 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag la 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad bstan te /
translated: or laymen or laywomen, should say to me, ‚ÄòVenerable One, it has been taught thus and thus by the Blessed One,‚Äô

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye bo la yongs su brtags nas chos 'di 'chad pa yin par ma zad kyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye bo la yongs su brtags nas chos 'di 'chad pa yin par ma zad kyi /
translated: the Blessed One teaches this Dharma after examining the beings to be trained. Not only that,

original: 'dir skye ba med par 'chad pa dang / sems can med par 'chad pa dang / dngos po med par 'chad pa la sogs pa ni ming tsam gyis kyang skrag par byed cing dad par mi byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir skye ba med par 'chad pa dang / sems can med par 'chad pa dang / dngos po med par 'chad pa la sogs pa ni ming tsam gyis kyang skrag par byed cing dad par mi byed pa yin no //
translated: Here, the explanations of non-arising, non-sentience, non-entity, and so on, are frightening just by their names and one does not have faith in them.

original: gal te de 'ga' zhig 'di'i ming 'dri na de la yang gang gis skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rnam grangs gzhan gyi sgo nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te de 'ga' zhig 'di'i ming 'dri na de la yang gang gis skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rnam grangs gzhan gyi sgo nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: If someone asks about the name of this, then in order to not be frightened by it, one should teach it by means of another enumeration.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one do that?

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo zhes brjod par bgyi'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo zhes brjod par bgyi'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, if someone asks that, I should say to them, ‚ÄúA discourse that does not contradict any phenomenon.‚ÄùüîΩWhy is that?

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Because all phenomena are contradictory.

original: de dag ni 'di las skye ba med pa la sogs par 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni 'di las skye ba med pa la sogs par 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are explained here as non-arising and so on.

original: chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo zhes de ci 'di la brdzun zer ram snyam pa ni rgol bar byed pa'i sems so //
analyzed: chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo zhes de ci 'di la brdzun zer ram snyam pa ni rgol bar byed pa'i sems so //
translated: The answer is:

original: lan ni bcom ldan 'das gang skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gal ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: lan ni bcom ldan 'das gang skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gal ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúBlessed One, there is no phenomenon that contradicts non-arising.‚Äù

original: skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos ni gang yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos ni gang yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no phenomenon that contradicts non-arising and non-entityness,

original: thams cad de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because everything is of the nature of those.

original: yi ge kha cig las gang skye ba ma mchis pa la 'gal ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te zhes 'byung ba de'i don ni skye ba med pa'i yul la 'gal ba gang yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge kha cig las gang skye ba ma mchis pa la 'gal ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te zhes 'byung ba de'i don ni skye ba med pa'i yul la 'gal ba gang yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Some texts read: ‚ÄúThere is no phenomenon that contradicts non-arising.‚Äù The meaning of that is: There is no phenomenon that contradicts the domain of non-arising,

original: thams cad skye ba med par bsdus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩci'i phyir mtha' de nyid rnam par mi dbye /
analyzed: thams cad skye ba med par bsdus pa'i phyir ro // ci'i phyir mtha' de nyid rnam par mi dbye /
translated: because everything is included within non-arising.üîΩWhy is that limit not differentiated?

original: gang gis na rnam grangs gzhan gyi sgo nas bshad /
analyzed: gang gis na rnam grangs gzhan gyi sgo nas bshad /
translated: Why is it explained from another perspective?

original: 'di la gsal bar byas pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la gsal bar byas pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not illuminated here,

original: bka' mchid de ni sems can gang gis kyang 'tshal bar sla ba ma lags so zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bka' mchid de ni sems can gang gis kyang 'tshal bar sla ba ma lags so zhes gsungs te /
translated: that statement is not easily understood by any sentient being.

original: kyang gi sgra ni mngon du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don to //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni mngon du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of the word ‚Äúmanifestly.‚Äù

original: sla ba zhes bya ba ni las byed pa'i bye brag yin no //
analyzed: sla ba zhes bya ba ni las byed pa'i bye brag yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúEasily‚Äù is a particular kind of action.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni lan grangs mang du gsal bar byas kyang ji ltar shes bar sla ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha @171a * //
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni lan grangs mang du gsal bar byas kyang ji ltar shes bar sla ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha @171a * //
translated: Why is that? This is the question: even though it is illuminated many times, how is it not easily understood?

original: tshig go // lan ni 'di ltar yod pa gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: tshig go // lan ni 'di ltar yod pa gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The answer is: because no existent is apprehended at all.

original: de la zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that‚Äù is the remainder.

original: yod pa ni gzung ba la sogs pa yod pa dang / de dmigs pa la bya ste /
analyzed: yod pa ni gzung ba la sogs pa yod pa dang / de dmigs pa la bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúExistent‚Äù refers to the existence of the apprehended and so on, and that is the object of observation.

original: de ni gang yang gtam de la bstan pa med do //
analyzed: de ni gang yang gtam de la bstan pa med do //
translated: That is not taught at all in that statement.

original: srog chags rnams kyis ni phal cher de la mngon par zhen pa'i lhun sdug pas de ltar don gsal bar byas su zin kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyis ni phal cher de la mngon par zhen pa'i lhun sdug pas de ltar don gsal bar byas su zin kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: This is the meaning of the statement: ‚ÄúIt is not easy to understand.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar res 'ga' yang yang dag pa'i don rnam par sgom par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar res 'ga' yang yang dag pa'i don rnam par sgom par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, one does not meditate on the meaning of reality again and again.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni yang na gzhan du zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni yang na gzhan du zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, Blessed One,‚Äù means ‚Äúagain‚Äù or ‚Äúelsewhere.‚Äù

original: bdag gis de la 'di skad du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur te zhes brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba yin na //
analyzed: bdag gis de la 'di skad du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur te zhes brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba yin na //
translated: I would say to him: ‚ÄúThe Dharma called ‚Äònon-arising‚Äô has been taught to me.‚Äù

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni 'dir bsam pa ni 'di ji ltar mi skye ba yin /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni 'dir bsam pa ni 'di ji ltar mi skye ba yin /
translated: Why is that? Here the thought is: ‚ÄúHow is it non-arising?‚Äù

original: ci 'di la skye ba yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni chos gal te de lta na 'o na shin tu thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci 'di la skye ba yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni chos gal te de lta na 'o na shin tu thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If this is the Dharma, then it would be a great absurdity.

original: 'di ltar 'chad pa gzhan dag la yang skye ba yod pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad pa gzhan dag la yang skye ba yod pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, the arising of other teachers would not exist.

original: 'di de la ltos na nyes par bstan pa ci yod ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di de la ltos na nyes par bstan pa ci yod ces bya ba yin no //
translated: What fault is there in teaching this?

original: lan ni / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni skye ba ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lan ni / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni skye ba ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúBlessed One, it is because all phenomena are the same in being non-arisen.‚Äù

original: de ltar bstan pa ni zhes bya ba ni tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de ltar bstan pa ni zhes bya ba ni tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin this way‚Äù is an ellipsis.

original: skye ba med pa'i ngo bor mnyam zhing mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i ngo bor mnyam zhing mthun pa yin te /
translated: They are the same, they are similar, in being non-arisen.

original: de rang bzhin mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rang bzhin mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the same in their nature.

original: bstan pa gzhan la ni de ltar bstan pa med do zhes bya ba 'di lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa gzhan la ni de ltar bstan pa med do zhes bya ba 'di lhag ma yin no //
translated: But in other teachings, this is not taught. This is the remainder.

original: bka' mchid der ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gong ma rtogs pa ma bstan to zhes bya ba des kyang skye ba med pa 'di bstan pa yin no zhes dgongs pa ste /
